 Are you a Python enthusiast with a strong background in data analysis? If so, we have the perfect job for you! Torry Harris, a leading IT consulting and services company, is currently seeking a Python Developer Data Analyst to join our team.  Job Title: Python Developer Data Analyst Company: Torry Harris Location: Remote or Bangalore, India  Job Description:  As a Python Developer Data Analyst at Torry Harris, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining Python-based data analysis solutions. You will work closely with our data scientists and business analysts to gather and understand requirements, and then transform them into efficient and scalable Python code.  Key Responsibilities:  1. Develop and maintain Python-based data analysis solutions 2. Collaborate with data scientists and business analysts to understand and fulfill requirements 3. Design and implement data processing and manipulation pipelines 4. Analyze and visualize complex data sets to derive insights and make recommendations 5. Build and maintain data models and algorithms 6. Ensure the security, privacy, and integrity of data 7. Support and troubleshoot data-related issues 8. Stay up to date with the latest trends and technologies in data analysis and Python development  Qualifications:  1. Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, or a related field 2. Proven experience as a Python Developer or Data Analyst 3. Proficiency in Python and its data analysis libraries (e.g. pandas, numpy, matplotlib) 4. Solid understanding of statistical analysis, machine learning, and data visualization 5. Experience with database management systems (e.g. SQL, NoSQL) 6. Strong problem-solving and analytical skills 7. Excellent communication and teamwork abilities 8. Knowledge of cloud platforms, such as AWS or Azure, is a plus  Why Work at Torry Harris:

Our mission is to empower learners worldwide with high-quality, accessible, and personalized education.
Our Vision:At Starweaver, we are committed to advancing our data infrastructure to support the continuous growth of our eLearning platform. Our goal is to optimize our data warehouse, ensure the highest standards of data quality, and seamlessly integrate new data sources to drive our analytical capabilities. By refining our data pipelines and enhancing our reporting tools, particularly through Power BI, we aim to provide our team with actionable insights that drive more informed decisions and fuel our mission to deliver transformative educational experiences.
We are particularly focused on optimizing our Starweaver Analytics tool, enriching our data sets, and enabling predictive analytics around course trends, learner engagement, and revenue growth. Additionally, we aim to strengthen our JourneyBuilder tool, which leverages generative AI to create personalized learning paths, ensuring every user receives the most effective and tailored educational experience.
Position Overview:We are seeking a skilled and motivated Data Architect to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have a deep understanding of data architecture, data warehousing, and data integration, with a strong focus on optimizing data pipelines and enhancing reporting capabilities. You will play a crucial role in ensuring the integrity, scalability, and performance of our data infrastructure, as well as in building comprehensive reporting solutions to support data-driven decision-making across the organization.

Job Description:
Job detailsHere’s how the job details align with your profile.Job typeFull-time LocationChennai, Tamil Nadu BenefitsPulled from the full job descriptionHealth insurance Full job description
The Company
PayPal has been revolutionizing commerce globally for more than 25 years. Creating innovative experiences that make moving money, selling, and shopping simple, personalized, and secure, PayPal empowers consumers and businesses in approximately 200 markets to join and thrive in the global economy.
 We operate a global, two-sided network at scale that connects hundreds of millions of merchants and consumers. We help merchants and consumers connect, transact, and complete payments, whether they are online or in person. PayPal is more than a connection to third-party payment networks. We provide proprietary payment solutions accepted by merchants that enable the completion of payments on our platform on behalf of our customers.
 We offer our customers the flexibility to use their accounts to purchase and receive payments for goods and services, as well as the ability to transfer and withdraw funds. We enable consumers to exchange funds more safely with merchants using a variety of funding sources, which may include a bank account, a PayPal or Venmo account balance, PayPal and Venmo branded credit products, a credit card, a debit card, certain cryptocurrencies, or other stored value products such as gift cards, and eligible credit card rewards. Our PayPal, Venmo, and Xoom products also make it safer and simpler for friends and family to transfer funds to each other. We offer merchants an end-to-end payments solution that provides authorization and settlement capabilities, as well as instant access to funds and payouts. We also help merchants connect with their customers, process exchanges and returns, and manage risk. We enable consumers to engage in cross-border shopping and merchants to extend their global reach while reducing the complexity and friction involved in enabling cross-border trade.
 Our beliefs are the foundation for how we conduct business every day. We live each day guided by our core values of Inclusion, Innovation, Collaboration, and Wellness. Together, our values ensure that we work together as one global team with our customers at the center of everything we do – and they push us to ensure we take care of ourselves, each other, and our communities.
Job Description Summary: What you need to know about the role- • This position is part of the Global Commercial Lending Credit Risk team and will be responsible for performing data analytics using machine learning tools to identify opportunities and build strategies to mitigate risk associated with commercial lending portfolio • This position will play a crucial role in developing and refining credit risk management strategies pertaining to New Accounts acquisition. • This position will be responsible for analyzing large datasets identifying trends and providing insights to inform decision making processes aimed at mitigating credit risk exposure for the organization. Meet our team • You will directly impact the Global Merchant Lending business by delivering strategies that will enable overall growth of the commercial lending portfolios, while effectively managing credit risk. • You will report to Manager, Global Commercial Lending • The GML Credit Risk team directly supports the GML Business Unit and other relevant key stakeholders across PayPal's Consumer, Merchant, Credit, and Payments Business Units.

We are looking for a UI/UX Design Intern
Location: Remote position
Duration: 6 months
Stipend: 10-15k per month
Who are we?
Ecowiser, a part of ThrivingZen (OPC) Private Limited is an organization focused on making sustainable living hassle-free and affordable. Ecowiser provides sustainable product recommendations across fashion, food, personal care, and household products.
We are looking for a driven, eager technology professional who wants to work in a diverse team of sustainability-focused personnel. We are building a scalable software product targeted toward the US/European consumer markets, to help promote sustainable and ethical consumption. You will be working on a fully remote basis and networking with INSEAD graduates, doctors, entrepreneurs and ex-Google employees.
For more information, visit our website.
Why Work with us?
We pride ourselves on focusing on users first, and rigorously evaluate and measure as we develop our products. Ecowiser fosters a culture of continual learning and development, a collaborative and exciting work environment, personal ownership of projects and career growth, flexible work schedules, and continually promotes team members to have a fulfilling life outside of work.
Job Role/Responsibilities:
1. Gain end-to-end product design experience by designing customer personas, talking to users, understanding main pain points, and designing relevant user experiences
2. Create user flows, wireframes, prototypes, and mockups for the website and chrome extension
3. Translate requirements into style guides, design systems, design patterns, and attractive user interfaces
4. Design UI elements such as input controls, navigational components, and informational components
5. Experiment and test different designs with users
Skills and Related Content:
skills and interests
5. Passionate about working towards a greener world!

Job Description: Job detailsHere’s how the job details align with your profile.Job typeFull-time LocationBengaluru, Karnataka Full job descriptionOur Company  Changing the world through digital experiences is what Adobe’s all about. We give everyone—from emerging artists to global brands—everything they need to design and deliver exceptional digital experiences! We’re passionate about empowering people to create beautiful and powerful images, videos, and apps, and transform how companies interact with customers across every screen.  We’re on a mission to hire the very best and are committed to creating exceptional employee experiences where everyone is respected and has access to equal opportunity. We realize that new ideas can come from everywhere in the organization, and we know the next big idea could be yours!  Job Description  Adobe InDesign is the industry-leading page design software and layout app that lets you create, pre-flight and publish professional documents for print and digital media. InDesign has everything you need to make posters, books, digital magazines, eBooks, interactive PDFs and more. InDesign is part of creative suite of products from Digital Media. InDesign is used by millions every month and touches the lives of people across the globe. Our development team tackles a wide variety of engineering problems - complex typography and layout algorithms, graphics handling, rendering, sophisticated UI design and much more. We are looking for a Technical member with ML expertise to join our team!  What you’ll do Own product solutions through their end to end development lifecycle ensuring high quality. As a key member of the team you will be expected to design, build, test and deploy stable, scalable and simple solutions. Work very closely with product management, experience designers, quality engineering for defining requirements for features. Focus on R&D as well as an innovative mindset to identify potential opportunities within the product The position involves identifying the right solution for given problem by identifying the data-set, model training/development, debugging, deployment at scale, monitoring, analysing, etc Work in highly collaborative, fast paced, agile environment. Work with highly flexible and geographically distributed teams. Mentor junior team members.  Must have skills: B.Tech /M.Tech in Computer Science & Engineering from a premier institute. More than 11 years of overall design / development experience and 5-7 years hands on experience in ML Proficient in Object Oriented Programming, data structures and algorithm. Knowledge of application development on multiple platforms including various flavours of Windows and Macintosh. Should have excellent knowledge in fundamentals of Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence. Should have hands on experience through ML Lifecycle from EDA to model deployment. Should have hands on experience data analysis tools like Jupyter, and packages like Numpy, Matplotlib etc. Familiarity with state-of-art deep learning frameworks, such as Tensorflow, PyTorch, Keras, Caffe, Torch. & architectures like Diffusion, LLM, etc. Can do attitude and willingness to take on challenges  Nice to have skills: Relevant work experience in the fields of computer vision and graphics Exposure to Cloud platforms like AWS/Azure. Develop cloud enabled, highly scalable and distributed solutions Familiarity with Docker, Kubernetes is a plus.  Adobe is proud to be an Equal Employment Opportunity and affirmative action employer. We do not discriminate based on gender, race or color, ethnicity or national origin, age, disability, religion, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, veteran status, or any other applicable characteristics protected by law. Our mission is to empower learners worldwide with high-quality, accessible, and personalized education.
Our Vision:At Starweaver, we are committed to advancing our data infrastructure to support the continuous growth of our eLearning platform. Our goal is to optimize our data warehouse, ensure the highest standards of data quality, and seamlessly integrate new data sources to drive our analytical capabilities. By refining our data pipelines and enhancing our reporting tools, particularly through Power BI, we aim to provide our team with actionable insights that drive more informed decisions and fuel our mission to deliver transformative educational experiences.
We are particularly focused on optimizing our Starweaver Analytics tool, enriching our data sets, and enabling predictive analytics around course trends, learner engagement, and revenue growth. Additionally, we aim to strengthen our JourneyBuilder tool, which leverages generative AI to create personalized learning paths, ensuring every user receives the most effective and tailored educational experience.
Position Overview:We are seeking a skilled and motivated Data Architect to join our dynamic team. Job detailsHere’s how the job details align with your profile.PayUp to ₹5,00,000 a yearJob typeFull-time LocationRemote BenefitsPulled from the full job descriptionWork from home Full job descriptionJob Opportunity: UI/UX Designer & Business Development Manager
Scrumlin Technology Pvt. Ltd., based in Bhubaneswar, Odisha, is looking for a highly skilled and versatile individual to join our team as a UI/UX Designer & Business Development Manager. This is a remote position with the flexibility to work from anywhere, though occasional office visits may be required.
Position: UI/UX Designer & Business Development Manager
Type: Full-Time, Remote (Office visits if required)
Location: Remote (Bhubaneswar, Odisha)
Salary: ₹5 LPA
Role Overview:
As a UI/UX Designer & Business Development Manager, you will be at the forefront of designing exceptional user experiences for our mobile and web applications while also driving our business growth. Your role will cover product management, product testing, and spearheading business development initiatives.
Key Responsibilities:
- UI/UX Design:
- Design user-friendly, aesthetically pleasing interfaces for mobile and web applications using Figma.
- Create wireframes, prototypes, and detailed user flows to optimize the user experience.
- Work closely with development teams to ensure designs are implemented as envisioned.
- Business Development:
- Identify and capitalize on new business opportunities and partnerships.
- Build and nurture relationships with clients, stakeholders, and industry partners.
- Develop and execute business strategies to drive growth and revenue.
- Product Management:
- Oversee the entire product lifecycle, from initial concept through to launch.
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define product vision, strategy, and roadmap.
- Align product development with business objectives to achieve company goals.
- Product Testing:
- Conduct thorough testing of mobile and web applications to ensure quality and usability.
- Identify, document, and work with the development team to resolve bugs and issues.
- Collect and analyze user feedback to guide design improvements and product updates.
Qualifications:
- Proven experience in UI/UX design with strong skills in Figma.
- Experience in product management and testing, particularly for mobile and web applications.
- Demonstrated success in business development with a track record of driving growth.
- Strong communication, negotiation, and problem-solving abilities.
- Ability to manage multiple responsibilities and work independently in a remote environment.
If you are a creative and strategic professional with a passion for design and business, we'd love to hear from you. Apply now to join Scrumlin Technology Pvt. Ltd. and contribute to our innovative and growing team!

Job detailsHere’s how the job details align with your profile.Job typeFull-time LocationChennai, Tamil Nadu BenefitsPulled from the full job descriptionHealth insurance Full job description
The Company
PayPal has been revolutionizing commerce globally for more than 25 years. Creating innovative experiences that make moving money, selling, and shopping simple, personalized, and secure, PayPal empowers consumers and businesses in approximately 200 markets to join and thrive in the global economy.
 We operate a global, two-sided network at scale that connects hundreds of millions of merchants and consumers. We help merchants and consumers connect, transact, and complete payments, whether they are online or in person. PayPal is more than a connection to third-party payment networks. We provide proprietary payment solutions accepted by merchants that enable the completion of payments on our platform on behalf of our customers.
 We offer our customers the flexibility to use their accounts to purchase and receive payments for goods and services, as well as the ability to transfer and withdraw funds. We enable consumers to exchange funds more safely with merchants using a variety of funding sources, which may include a bank account, a PayPal or Venmo account balance, PayPal and Venmo branded credit products, a credit card, a debit card, certain cryptocurrencies, or other stored value products such as gift cards, and eligible credit card rewards. Our PayPal, Venmo, and Xoom products also make it safer and simpler for friends and family to transfer funds to each other. We offer merchants an end-to-end payments solution that provides authorization and settlement capabilities, as well as instant access to funds and payouts. We also help merchants connect with their customers, process exchanges and returns, and manage risk. We enable consumers to engage in cross-border shopping and merchants to extend their global reach while reducing the complexity and friction involved in enabling cross-border trade.
 Our beliefs are the foundation for how we conduct business every day. We live each day guided by our core values of Inclusion, Innovation, Collaboration, and Wellness. Together, our values ensure that we work together as one global team with our customers at the center of everything we do – and they push us to ensure we take care of ourselves, each other, and our communities.
Job Description Summary: What you need to know about the role- • This position is part of the Global Commercial Lending Credit Risk team and will be responsible for performing data analytics using machine learning tools to identify opportunities and build strategies to mitigate risk associated with commercial lending portfolio • This position will play a crucial role in developing and refining credit risk management strategies pertaining to New Accounts acquisition. • This position will be responsible for analyzing large datasets identifying trends and providing insights to inform decision making processes aimed at mitigating credit risk exposure for the organization. Meet our team • You will directly impact the Global Merchant Lending business by delivering strategies that will enable overall growth of the commercial lending portfolios, while effectively managing credit risk. • You will report to Manager, Global Commercial Lending • The GML Credit Risk team directly supports the GML Business Unit and other relevant key stakeholders across PayPal's Consumer, Merchant, Credit, and Payments Business Units.

We are looking for a UI/UX Design Intern
Location: Remote position
Duration: 6 months
Stipend: 10-15k per month
Who are we?
Ecowiser, a part of ThrivingZen (OPC) Private Limited is an organization focused on making sustainable living hassle-free and affordable. Ecowiser provides sustainable product recommendations across fashion, food, personal care, and household products.
We are looking for a driven, eager technology professional who wants to work in a diverse team of sustainability-focused personnel. We are building a scalable software product targeted toward the US/European consumer markets, to help promote sustainable and ethical consumption. You will be working on a fully remote basis and networking with INSEAD graduates, doctors, entrepreneurs and ex-Google employees.
For more information, visit our website.
Why Work with us?
We pride ourselves on focusing on users first, and rigorously evaluate and measure as we develop our products. Ecowiser fosters a culture of continual learning and development, a collaborative and exciting work environment, personal ownership of projects and career growth, flexible work schedules, and continually promotes team members to have a fulfilling life outside of work.
Job Role/Responsibilities:
1. Gain end-to-end product design experience by designing customer personas, talking to users, understanding main pain points, and designing relevant user experiences
2. Create user flows, wireframes, prototypes, and mockups for the website and chrome extension
3. Translate requirements into style guides, design systems, design patterns, and attractive user interfaces
4. Design UI elements such as input controls, navigational components, and informational components
5. Experiment and test different designs with users
Skills and Related Content:
skills and interests
5. Passionate about working towards a greener world!

Job Description:
Job detailsHere’s how the job details align with your profile.Job typeFull-timeShift and scheduleEvening shiftDay shift LocationBengaluru Vishwavidyalaya, Bengaluru, Karnataka Full job descriptionEmergent Risk International (ERI) is seeking to hire full-time early career Risk Intelligence Analyst to be embedded with one of our multinational clients, to be based in Bengaluru, India.
Candidates for this role will have an analytical mindset, desire to work in a dynamic, fast-paced environment with a focus on global threat intelligence analysis, geopolitics, physical security and crisis communications. This is a remote role. The position will be based in Bengaluru, India. 
About US: ERI is a global risk and security intelligence advisory firm headquartered in Newport, Rhode Island with offices in Austin, Washington DC, Greater Boston, the United Kingdom, Ireland, India, Mexico, Portugal, and Singapore. We support global security, risk management, business continuity and other risk-focused departments of Fortune 500 companies and multi-national organizations. We help our clients assess risk to their organizations; whether that risk emanates from geopolitics, security threats, economic forces or regulatory initiatives that may impact bottom-line revenue or threaten personnel and company assets.
ERI operates five lines of business:
● Assessment and Analysis: We provide our clients daily, subscription-based and bespoke geopolitical and threat intelligence services.
● Training: We train intelligence analysts to serve effectively in corporate environments. Our training focuses on tradecraft and tools that drive more efficient and effective analysis. We offer a range of in-house and open training courses to address specific levels of experience and need.
● Online Platform: We offer a subscription-based online portal that provides a workspace environment for security intelligence analysts, combining ERI’s expert analysis with hundreds of curated datasets and our suite of data visualization tools.
● Consulting: We help companies develop and improve their intelligence programs, providing end-to-end support; from assessing needs and providing analysis to recruiting and hiring highly qualified candidates.
● Embedded Analyst Services: We support our clients with embedded analysts, full- and part-time, short- and long-term. Our embedded analysts work directly for our clients, allowing them the benefit of employing intelligence professionals trained to ERI’s strict standards of competency and continually professionally developed by ERI’s senior leadership, armed with access to ERI’s proprietary tools and deep backbench of in-house subject matter experts.
What We Are Looking For:
The early career intelligence analyst will support operations by collecting intelligence and assisting with evaluating global events. The analyst will monitor real-time events, prioritize situations of concern to the company’s assets, operations and travelers, and draft operationally-focused products with minimal supervision, providing both tactical and strategic analysis as needed. The analyst will write timely, accurate, and relevant tactical alerts and situation reports as well as in-depth strategic reports. The analyst must be a self-starter, composed under pressure, and possess high-quality written and verbal skills in English.
Primary responsibilities include:
· Gather and manage information and intelligence about domestic and international events using a variety of OSINT resources, client tools and social media to verify the impact of physical security threats as well as global geopolitical events, extreme weather, political and civil unrest and other threats of potential impact to the client’s assets, operations, people and reputation.
· Develop an expert understanding of the client’s business model and asset, operations and locations, ensuring that all intelligence and reporting is tailored to the client’s specific needs.
· Draft concise, accurate, and error-free intelligence reports.
· Apply subject matter expertise to develop methodologies for evaluating and responding to a variety of threats.
· Understand, interrogate, and visualize high-quality data to draw analytic conclusions and add additional context to analysis and reporting.
· Develop and maintain deep knowledge base of sources including OSINT, social media, client databases, sources and archives.
· Successfully complete all ERI training, mentorship and other ERI initiatives as appropriate.
· Regularly attend ERI Global Team Meetings, webinars and engage with other ERI analysts.
· Additional tasks as necessary.
Experience: The right candidate will possess most or all of the following qualifications:
· 2-5 years’ experience in government or private sector intelligence, protective intelligence or geopolitical risk analysis.
· Bachelor’s degree in a related discipline (Master’s degree advantageous), preferably in Political Science, International Relations, or social/regional studies.
· Experience with living or working outside your home country.
· Comfortable with ambiguity and taking initiative.
· Proficiency and understanding of social media and open-source intelligence collection and analysis.
· Basic cybersecurity (basic understanding of risks) and its intersection with physical security risks.
· Self-motivated with a growth mindset, able to manage time and prioritize effectively. Demonstrated ability to overcome obstacles to get the job done.
· Superior English language writing and editing skills with strong attention to detail and fluency in languages other than English.
· Quick thinking and response time during crisis events.
· Ability to receive direct feedback and incorporate corrections quickly. Excellent interpersonal and problem-solving skills.
· Mapping skills preferred.
· A strong commitment to ethical private-sector intelligence practices.
· The ability to maintain confidentiality around security-specific information.
· Must be able to pass a pre-employment background screening and locally compliant reference checks and pre-employment drug screening where allowed by law.
Remuneration: This role will be a full-time (40 hours per week) position with pay and benefits commensurate with experience and locally competitive salaries.
Application Deadline: September 20, 2024
Please send your resume, cover letter, and a recent writing sample to: eriteam(at)emergentriskinternational(dot)com
Due to the high volume of applicants, only selected candidates will be contacted.
All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or national origin. To be considered for the position, all applicants must be legal residents of India and must independently possess eligibility to work in the country where the position is located.

Job Description: Job detailsHere’s how the job details align with your profile.Job typePermanentFull-time LocationBengaluru, Karnataka Full job descriptionCandidate should have working experience with AMS Verification on multiple SOC’s or sub-systems. One should have proficiency in AMS simulation environment using Cadence/Synopsys/Mentor tools. Knowledge of digital design techniques, Verilog HDL, and standard RTL coding styles, as well as analog circuit basics, with previous analog design experience a plus. Candidate should be familiar with the concepts of behavioral modeling - both digital (Verilog-D) and analog (Verilog-A or Verilog-AMS). Experience in SV and UVM testbench development/modifications from mixed signal perspective is a plus. Functional knowledge of analog and mixed signal building blocks, such as comparators, op-amps, switched cap circuits, various types of ADCs and DACs, current mirrors, charge pumps, and regulators is expected. Working knowledge of Perl / Skill/ Python/Tcl or other scripting relevant language is a plus. Candidate should have ability to lead a project team, and work collaboratively in a multi-site development environment.

Job Description:
Job detailsHere’s how the job details align with your profile.Pay₹15,000 - ₹30,000 a monthJob typeFull-timeShift and scheduleDay shift LocationCalicut, Kerala Full job descriptionAs a MERN (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js) and Python full-stack trainer, you would need a diverse set of skills to effectively teach and guide your students. Here are some of the key skills required:
1. Programming Languages and Frameworks:
- Proficiency in JavaScript and Python, including their syntax, data types, and control structures.
- Expertise in the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js) or the Python stack (Django, Flask, or FastAPI).
- Understanding of web development concepts, such as HTTP, REST APIs, and web protocols.
2. Front-end Development:
- Extensive knowledge of React.js, including components, state management, and lifecycle methods.
- Familiarity with modern front-end tools and libraries, such as Redux, React Router, Axios, and others.
- Ability to create responsive and user-friendly interfaces using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
3. Back-end Development:
- Proficiency in server-side technologies, such as Node.js (for MERN) or Python frameworks (Django, Flask, FastAPI).
- Understanding of database management, including MongoDB (for MERN) or SQL databases (for Python).
- Experience in designing and implementing RESTful APIs and handling server-side logic.
4. Full-stack Understanding:
- Ability to understand the end-to-end web application development process, from front-end to back-end.
- Knowledge of deployment and hosting platforms, such as Heroku, AWS, or Microsoft Azure.
- Familiarity with version control systems, such as Git, and collaborative development workflows.
5. Teaching and Communication Skills:
- Strong presentation and communication skills to effectively deliver lectures and workshops.
- Ability to break down complex topics into easily understandable concepts for students.
- Patience and empathy to guide students through their learning process.
6. Continuous Learning:
- Staying up-to-date with the latest trends, technologies, and best practices in web development.
- Ability to research, learn, and incorporate new tools and frameworks as they emerge.
- Willingness to experiment and learn alongside your students.
7. *Problem-solving and Debugging*:
- Excellent problem-solving skills to help students debug their code and troubleshoot issues.
- Ability to analyze and identify the root causes of problems, and provide effective solutions.
- Familiarity with common debugging tools and techniques, both in the front-end and back-end.
8. Project Management and Soft Skills
- Ability to design and structure course curricula and lesson plans.
- Strong time management and organization skills to ensure efficient class delivery.
- Interpersonal skills to foster a collaborative and supportive learning environment.
By possessing these skills, you can effectively teach and train aspiring full-stack developers in the MERN or Python stack, helping them develop the necessary competencies to succeed in the field of web development.
Job Type: Full-time
Schedule:

Job Role: Data Analyst
 Job Description:
The Data Analyst role involves supporting the Vessel Performance & Analytics team in delivering advanced monitoring and optimization projects for vessel performance. The candidate will provide data-driven decision support to clients, work closely with technical teams to develop systems for performance monitoring, and contribute to the enhancement of in-house analysis methods. Additionally, the candidate will work with various organizational stakeholders to identify data-driven opportunities and execute predictive modeling for product efficiency optimization. This position is ideal for candidates with 2 years of experience and a background in mechanical engineering or naval architecture.

 Forbes Advisor is a new initiative for consumers under the Forbes Marketplace umbrella that provides journalist- and expert-written insights, news and reviews on all things personal finance, health, business, and everyday life decisions.
We do this by providing consumers with the knowledge and research they need to make informed decisions they can feel confident in, so they can get back to doing the things they care about most. Job Description:
Job detailsHere’s how the job details align with your profile.Pay₹6,00,000 - ₹7,00,000 a yearJob typeTemporaryShift and scheduleMorning shift LocationGurugram, Haryana BenefitsPulled from the full job descriptionProvident Fund Full job descriptionJob Summary:
The Data Reporting Executive is responsible for gathering, analyzing, and reporting data to support business operations and strategic decision-making. This role involves creating detailed reports, dashboards, and visualizations that provide insights into various aspects of the business.
Key Responsibilities:
1. Data Collection and Analysis:
- Collect and analyze data from various sources to provide accurate and timely reports.
- Identify trends, patterns, and insights from data to support business decisions.
- Ensure data integrity and accuracy by performing regular data validation and quality checks.
2. Report Generation:
- Develop and maintain regular reports and dashboards to track key performance indicators (KPIs).
- Create ad-hoc reports as required by different departments.
- Use data visualization tools to present data in a clear and actionable manner.
3. Collaboration:
- Work closely with different stakeholders to understand their data needs and requirements.
- Provide insights and recommendations based on data analysis.
- Support teams in interpreting and using data effectively for their operations.
4. Data Management:
- Maintain databases and data systems to ensure they are up-to-date and accessible.
- Implement data governance policies and procedures.
- Ensure compliance with data privacy and security regulations.
5. Process Improvement:
- Identify opportunities to improve data collection and reporting processes.
- Develop and implement best practices for data reporting and analysis.
- Stay updated with the latest trends and technologies in data reporting and analytics.
Required Skills and Qualifications:
- Education: Bachelor’s degree / B.Tech / B.E.
- Experience: Minimum of 2-4 years of experience in data analysis, reporting, or a similar role.
- Technical Skills: Proficiency in data analysis tools and software such as SQL, Excel, Tableau, Power BI, or similar.
- Analytical Skills: Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
- Attention to Detail: High level of accuracy and attention to detail in data analysis and reporting.
- Communication: Excellent verbal and written communication skills to convey data insights effectively.
- Organizational Skills: Strong organizational and time-management skills to handle multiple tasks and deadlines.
Job Type: TemporaryContract length: 11 months
Benefits:

Job Title: Lead AI / ML / Data Science Engineer - India
Job Description:
Job detailsHere’s how the job details align with your profile.Pay₹63,43,673 a yearJob typeFull-timePart-timeShift and scheduleMonday to Friday LocationRemote BenefitsPulled from the full job descriptionFlexible schedule Full job descriptionFounding Teams is a new AI Tech Incubator and talent platform. We are supporting the next generation of AI startup founders with the resources they need including engineering, product, sales, marketing, and operations staff to create and launch their products...
The ideal candidate will have a passion for next-generation AI tech startups and working with great global startup talent.
Job Title: - Lead Engineer
Company: Stealth AI Startup
Remote: 16-20 hours per week.
Flexible hours : Yes
Job Description
- Build prototype AI/ ML models and tools to help us understand our customers and create personalised customer recommendations across multiple use cases and productize solutions to scale
- Deeply understand customers, their behaviours and pain points, and develop a diversity of AI models addressing an array of customers’ needs
- Translate business needs into AI/ML problems and create innovative solutions to advance our business goals
- Determine the types and amount of data needed and work with data engineer to identify data sources and ingest into data lake
- Structure, standardise, and annotate data into processable formats for ML; enrich data with necessary attributes to allow sophisticated personalization
- Help shape the way our data science team does work - researching and making key decisions about what we build, how we build it, and which tools are best for solving our problems
- Work alongside software and data engineers to implement data processing and visualisation systems that make data readily available and simplify how insights are communicated
- Evaluate the performance of AI models and make tradeoffs against quality metrics
Investigate, and resolve performance issues in a timely manner
Requirements
- Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Mathematics, ML, statistics, Computer Science, Software/Data Engineering, or a related field
- Strong mathematical background in probability, statistics, and optimization algorithms.
- Experience in building machine learning models and deploying them to production to make real decisions, then measuring the impact of these decisions.

Job Title: Knowledge Analyst - Center for Customer Insight (CCI)
Job Description:
Job detailsHere’s how the job details align with your profile.Job typeFull-time LocationGurugram, Haryana Full job description
Who We Are
Boston Consulting Group partners with leaders in business and society to tackle their most important challenges and capture their greatest opportunities. BCG was the pioneer in business strategy when it was founded in 1963. Today, we help clients with total transformation-inspiring complex change, enabling organizations to grow, building competitive advantage, and driving bottom-line impact.  To succeed, organizations must blend digital and human capabilities. Our diverse, global teams bring deep industry and functional expertise and a range of perspectives to spark change. BCG delivers solutions through leading-edge management consulting along with technology and design, corporate and digital ventures—and business purpose. We work in a uniquely collaborative model across the firm and throughout all levels of the client organization, generating results that allow our clients to thrive.
 What You'll Do
As a Knowledge Analyst (KA) within Knowledge Team in India, you will work in a growing global team, providing consumer research expertise and insights whilst working together with case and proposal teams to provide knowledge assets, analysis and expert advisory. You’ll serve as a thought partner and content expert to case teams and topic/sector leaders, helping structure and solve complex issues.
Skills and Related Content: skills to interact with internal and external stakeholder while working in a global collaborative team environment

Summary:LearnTastic is seeking a dynamic and experienced Customer Experience Lead to join our team. The ideal candidate will develop and implement strategies to enhance the customer journey, ensuring a seamless and satisfying experience across all touchpoints. This role is crucial in driving customer satisfaction, loyalty, and retention by leveraging insights, innovative solutions, and cross-functional collaboration. This position is 100% remote and can be hired from anywhere in the world.Roles and Responsibilities:1. Strategic Planning: Develop and implement a comprehensive customer experience (CX) strategy that aligns with the company’s overall goals and vision. Identify and prioritize CX initiatives to drive customer satisfaction, loyalty, and retention.2. Customer Journey Mapping: Analyze and map the entire customer journey to identify touchpoints and areas for improvement. Develop strategies to optimize and enhance each stage of the customer journey.3.Research and Insights: Conduct user research and gather customer feedback to understand needs, behaviors, and pain points. Utilize data and insights to inform CX strategies and decision-making.4. Design and Implementation: Lead the design and implementation of user interfaces and experiences across all customer touchpoints. Ensure consistency, usability, and a seamless experience across digital and physical channels.5. Performance Measurement: Establish key performance indicators (KPIs) to measure the effectiveness of CX initiatives. Monitor and analyze CX metrics to track progress and identify opportunities for improvement.6. Team Leadership: Manage and mentor a team of UX/UI designers, researchers, and other CX professionals. Foster a collaborative and innovative team environment.7. Cross-Functional Collaboration: Work closely with other departments, such as marketing, sales, product development, and customer support, to ensure a cohesive customer experience. Advocate for the customer in cross-functional meetings and decision-making processes.8. Customer Feedback Management: Develop and maintain systems for collecting, analyzing, and responding to customer feedback. Implement changes based on feedback to continuously improve the customer experience.9. Innovation and Trends: Stay informed about industry trends and best practices in CX. - Introduce innovative solutions and technologies to enhance the customer experience.10. Communication and Reporting: Communicate CX strategies, plans, and progress to senior leadership and stakeholders. Prepare and present reports on CX performance and initiatives.11. Budget Management: Develop and manage the budget for CX initiatives. Ensure efficient allocation of resources to achieve maximum impact.12. Compliance and Standards: Ensure that all customer interactions comply with legal and regulatory requirements. Maintain high standards of customer service and ethical practices.Education:Bachelor’s degree in Business, Marketing, Design, or a related field (Master’s preferred).-Experience: 5-10 years of proven experience in a CX, UX/UI, or similar role. Experience in leading and managing teams. Strong background in user research and data analysis.Skills: Excellent communication and interpersonal skills. Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities. Proficiency in CX tools and technologies. Ability to think strategically and drive results. Personal Attributes: Customer-centric mindset. Strong leadership qualities. Innovative and forward-thinking. Detail-oriented and organized. Customer journey mapping, performance measurement of CX initiatives.Customer Feedback management.
Preferred: CX Experience is a must.

Pay: ₹50,000.00 - ₹100,000.00 per month

Key Responsibilities:
SEO Strategy Development: Develop and implement effective search engine optimization (SEO) strategies to improve our website's visibility on search engines.
Campaign Coordination: Coordinate with content, design, social media, and pay-per-click (PPC) marketing teams to align strategies and campaigns for maximum impact.
Project Management: Manage offsite and onsite optimization projects and regularly report on performance, ensuring continuous improvement and alignment with business goals.
Keyword Research: Conduct keyword research to guide content teams and inform content creation, ensuring our website and content are optimized for relevant search queries.
Technical SEO: Review technical SEO issues, recommend and implement fixes to improve website performance and rankings.
Content Optimization: Optimize website content and landing pages to ensure they are engaging, relevant, and aligned with SEO best practices.
Data Collection and Reporting: Collect data and report on traffic, rankings, and other SEO aspects, providing insights and recommendations based on data analysis.
Trend Monitoring: Keep abreast of SEO and integrated marketing trends, tools, and best practices to ensure our strategies remain current and effective.

Benefits:

Job Description: full job descriptionWork from home Full job descriptionJob Description At Boeing, we innovate and collaborate to make the world a better place. From the seabed to outer space, you can contribute to work that matters with a company where diversity, equity and inclusion are shared values. We’re committed to fostering an environment for every teammate that’s welcoming, respectful and inclusive, with great opportunity for professional growth. Find your future with us. Overview  As a leading global aerospace company, Boeing develops, manufactures and services commercial airplanes, defense products and space systems for customers in more than 150 countries. As a top U.S. exporter, the company leverages the talents of a global supplier base to advance economic opportunity, sustainability and community impact. Boeing’s diverse team is committed to innovating for the future, leading with sustainability, and cultivating a culture based on the company’s core values of safety, quality and integrity.  Technology for today and tomorrow  The Boeing India Engineering & Technology Center (BIETC) in India is leveraging a diverse talented pool of 5,500+ engineers, technologists, and innovators to drive growth and innovation in the global aerospace sector These engineers deliver cutting-edge R&D, innovation, and high-quality engineering work in global markets in traditional and emerging areas, and leverage new-age technologies such as AI/ML, IIoT, Cloud, Model-Based Engineering, and Additive Manufacturing, to enhance quality, safety, and productivity for airline customers, shaping the future of aerospace in India for India, and the world.  People-driven culture  At Boeing, we believe creativity and innovation thrives when every employee is trusted, empowered, and has the flexibility to choose, grow, learn, and explore. We offer variable arrangements depending upon business and customer needs, and professional pursuits that offer greater flexibility in the way our people work. We also believe that collaboration, frequent team engagements, and face-to-face meetings bring diverse perspectives and thoughts – enabling every voice to be heard and every perspective to be respected. No matter where or how our teammates work, we are committed to positively shaping people’s careers and being thoughtful about employee wellbeing.  At Boeing, we are inclusive , diverse , and transformative  With us, you can create and contribute to what matters most in your career, community, country, and world. Join us in powering the progress of global aerospace.  The Boeing Company’s Information Technology & Data Analytics (IT&DA) organization is currently seeking an high performing versatile software developer to join the Offer to Cash product team in Bangalore, India. The portfolio includes products and services that support estimating and pricing businesses processes. This role will have great exposure and visibility at both the working and leadership levels across many facets of the organization.  This role will be based out of Bangalore , India. skills, and technical knowledge of banking systems and processes in order to work  in a client facing role capturing the client expectations and help shape a solution to fulfill  the requirements.  Responsibilities:   Collaborate with business stakeholders, IT Teams and Product managers to understand  their needs, identify opportunities for improvement, identify pain points and define  business requirements for banking products, services, and systems and define solutions   Analyze existing banking processes, workflows, and data to identify areas for  optimization and automation   Conduct gap analysis to identify discrepancies between business needs and current  system capabilities   Develop user stories, flowcharts, and other documentation (like BRD, FRD, SRS) to  clearly communicate business needs to technical teams and also assist to create Project  Plans   Document business requirements clearly, concisely, and accurately using industry-  standard tools and methodologies (e.g., UML, use cases).   Present information professionally &amp;amp; concisely with supporting data   Work collaboratively with cross functional teams, developers, testers, and other IT  professionals to ensure that systems are designed and implemented according to  business requirements   Test and validate system functionalities to ensure they meet business requirements   Facilitate and review Test Scripts and test data creation in SIT, and assisting execution  and defect management using Jira in UAT and CUG   Coordinate with multiple vendors for API mapping document creation, API testing and  API provisioning   Work closely with the project managers to lead the team in daily standups and planning   Create user training materials and impart user training to business uses. Conduct  training sessions for new features and functionalities on new banking systems and  processes for internal teams   Assist in Business Development. Attend meetings with potential clients to determine the  business requirements, ensuring all necessary information is gathered for presenting a  proposal  Qualifications   4-7 years of experience as a Business Analyst (most of which should be in banking  industry)   Good understanding of banking products, services, and regulations.   Should have worked for gathering and analyzing business requirements for at least one  of the banking systems and processes (such as customer onboarding, Core Banking  Systems, banking products such as savings account, deposits, loans (LOS, LMS)
payment gateway integration, etc.)   Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills   Excellent communication skills, interpersonal, and presentation skill, self-initiated,  business &amp;amp; technology savvy   Proficient in Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint) and business analysis  tools (e.g., Visio, Jira)   Basic understanding in SQL and log analysis   Basic understanding of APIs (including endpoints, request and response structures)   Experience of delivering the project in delivery methodology (e.g. waterfall, Agile,  Scrum)  Good to Have   Stay up to date on the latest banking regulations and industry trends   Experience with user experience (UX) is good to have   Knowledge of Programming languages like Java is good to have   Knowledge of Analytics Tools such as Google Analytics is a plus

They should be graduates in commerce, economics, business, and related subjects or intermediate/advanced professional students doing courses such as MBA, CA, CMA, CFA, who may have finished Inter and preparing for finals. Candidates who have taken CA Finals or CFA exams Level 2/3 or will be taking in May,2024 would be highly preferred. They could start the internship after completing the exams.

Helping prepare videos as published on our YouTube channel
Additional information:
1. We are inviting applications from postgraduate students with first-class academic records and good communication skills. The channel is in English. 2. Stipend will be paid only to candidates who successfully produce the required videos3. In case of exams etc., candidates can be allowed 2-3 weeks additional time to complete their videos4. The interns are credited in the videos for their contributions5. Before applying, you are required to see this channel and get an idea about your role: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCZxw-Bjl5H6_uQ-o3zRl7_A/videos

Job Description: Job detailsHere’s how the job details align with your profile.Pay₹50,000 - ₹1,50,000 a yearJob typeFull-time LocationIndia BenefitsPulled from the full job descriptionFlexible scheduleWork from home Full job descriptionTravitons Technologies Pvt. Ltd. 3 - 15 Years INR 0.5 - 1.5 LPA India Job Description  Job Summary: We are seeking a talented UI/UX Designer to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a passion for user-centered design, a keen eye for aesthetics, and the ability to translate high-level requirements into intuitive and functional user interfaces. As a UI/UX Designer, you will be responsible for creating wireframes, prototypes, and visual designs while collaborating closely with cross-functional teams to deliver exceptional user experiences.  Responsibilities: 1. Develop wireframes, mockups, and prototypes to effectively communicate design ideas.  2. Create user-centric designs by understanding user needs, behaviors, and motivations through user research and feedback analysis.  3. Collaborate with product managers and developers to translate business goals and user needs into innovative design solutions.  4. Conduct usability testing and gather feedback to iterate on designs and enhance user satisfaction.  5. Maintain design consistency across all platforms and ensure adherence to brand guidelines.  6. Stay updated on industry trends, best practices, and emerging technologies to continuously improve design processes and outcomes.  7. Advocate for the user throughout the design process, ensuring that their needs are at the forefront of decision-making.  8. Work closely with stakeholders to gather requirements and refine design solutions based on feedback and objectives.  9. Participate in cross-functional team meetings and contribute to the overall product strategy and roadmap.  10. Collaborate with UI developers to ensure seamless implementation of designs and maintain design integrity throughout the development lifecycle.  Requirements  1. Bachelor's degree in Design, Human-Computer Interaction, or related field. (Master's degree preferred)  2. Proven experience as a UI/UX Designer or similar role, with a strong portfolio showcasing your design expertise and process.  3. Proficiency in design tools such as Adobe XD, Sketch, Figma, or similar software.  4. Solid understanding of user-centered design principles, usability best practices, and interaction design concepts.  5. Experience conducting user research, usability testing, and data-driven design decisions.  6. Excellent communication and collaboration skills with the ability to articulate design concepts and rationale to diverse stakeholders.  7. Strong attention to detail and ability to work in a fast-paced environment with tight deadlines.  8. Familiarity with front-end development technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript) is a plus.  9. Ability to adapt to changing priorities and requirements while maintaining a positive attitude.  10. Passion for learning and continuously improving your design skills and knowledge. Job Description: Job detailsHere’s how the job details align with your profile.Job typeFull-timeShift and scheduleRotational shift LocationBengaluru, Karnataka Full job descriptionSkill required: Clinical Data Operations - Clinical eTMF Management Designation: Clinical Data Svs Analyst Qualifications:Bachelor of Pharmacy/Master of Pharmacy  Years of Experience:3 to 5 years  Language - Ability:English - Expert  About Accenture Accenture is a global professional services company with leading capabilities in digital, cloud and security.Combining unmatched experience and specialized skills across more than 40 industries, we offer Strategy and Consulting, Technology and Operations services, and Accenture Song— all powered by the world’s largest network of Advanced Technology and Intelligent Operations centers. Our 699,000 people deliver on the promise of technology and human ingenuity every day, serving clients in more than 120 countries. We embrace the power of change to create value and shared success for our clients, people, shareholders, partners and communities.Visit us at www.accenture.com  What would you do? You will be aligned with our Life Sciences R&D vertical. Our services span across the entire life sciences enterprise, from research laboratories, clinical trials support, and regulatory services, to pharmacovigilance and patient services solutions. Employees under this span will be a part of one of the sub-offerings - Clinical, Pharmacovigilance & Regulatory, helping the worldâ€™s leading biopharma companies bring their vision to life â€“ enabling them to improve outcomes by converging around the patient, connecting scientific expertise with unique insights into the patient experience. The Clinical Data Management team focuses on the collection, integration, and availability of data at appropriate quality and cost. The team is responsible for performing data management activities including discrepancy review, query generation, and resolution. The team is also responsible for creating CRF Completion Guidelines (CCG) and SAE reconciliation guidelines. They help identify and raise protocol deviations in the database, perform edit check validation by creating test cases, write test scripts, and carry out database validation (UAT) against the specified CRF/ECRF. The team also managing clinical data management projects. You will be expected to use strategies, methods and tools used throughout the lifecycle of the clinical trial regulated content. Includes data review and accuracy checks of trial master file table of contents, head quarters, initial full protocol package and amended FPP checklists, end of trial checklists, essential document reconciliation, and clinical study report appendices. What are we looking for? •Ability to manage multiple stakeholders •Ability to perform under pressure •Agility for quick learning •Commitment to quality •Written and verbal communication  Roles and Responsibilities: •In this role you are required to do analysis and solving of lower-complexity problems • Your day to day interaction is with peers within Accenture before updating supervisors • In this role you may have limited exposure with clients and/or Accenture management • You will be given moderate level instruction on daily work tasks and detailed instructions on new assignments • The decisions you make impact your own work and may impact the work of others • You will be an individual contributor as a part of a team, with a focused scope of work • Please note that this role may require you to work in rotational shifts  Bachelor of Pharmacy,Master of Pharmacy You must create an Indeed account before continuing to the company website to applyApply nowsave-iconReport job Clinical Analyst jobs in Bengaluru, KarnatakaJobs at Accenture in Bengaluru, KarnatakaClinical Analyst salaries in Bengaluru, Karnataka

Purpose of the Profile:
The Data Analyst will work with cross functional teams across Data Science, Product& Services and Marketing teams. He/She will be responsible for data extraction, cleansing, processing and creating reportsusing BI tools. The Data Analyst is expected to be extremely diligent as his/her inputs will be used formaking critical business decisions by the leadership team. The role will require critical thinking toanalyse the data for correctness, detect anomalies, analyse key trends and build analytical reports forconsumption of various internal and external clients.
High level of integrity is a key requirement as we are dealing with extremely sensitive and confidentialhealthcare data.
Key Responsibilities
To using Mednet -Hospital Information System (HIS) to fetch data of variuos departments to analyse.
Managing master data, including creation, updates, and deletion.
Processing confidential data and information according to guidelines.
Creating reports and analysis using Google Spreadsheets and BI tools
Improvise on new reports and dashboard creations for top management.
Provide suggestions on improvements with regards to revenue leakage.
Providing technical expertise in data storage structures, data mining, and data cleansing.
Educational Requirements
Bachelor’s degree from reputed Engineering colleges
2-3 years of work experience as a data analyst preferably in a Hospital/Healthcare Service provider.
Proficiency in using query languages such as SQL and experience of working with relationaland non-relational databases like mySQL, PostGres, Presto, Mongo (Athena/redshiftexperience is an added advantage)
Proficiency in any modern BI tools like Tableau
Understanding of Python for Data pre-processing/Cleaning for ML models will be a keyadvantage
Understanding of Basic Statistics
Excellent written and verbal communication skills.

Job Description: Job detailsHere’s how the job details align with your profile.Job typeFull-time LocationRemote BenefitsPulled from the full job descriptionWork from home Full job descriptionJob Description Help us write more technical blogs and also write analysis around adoption within our ecosystem Help create more long form thought leadership about the direction and positioning of Polygon as a blockchain compared to our competitors  Requirements You have an engineering background or equity research background You’re comfortable with crunching numbers and statistics You know what datasets you want to analyze and are highly resourceful  About Company / Benefits Polygon (Previously Matic Network) is the first well-structured, easy-to-use platform for Ethereum scaling and infrastructure development. Its core component is Polygon SDK, a modular, flexible framework that supports building multiple types of applications. Using Polygon, one can create Optimistic Rollup chains, ZK Rollup chains, stand alone chains or any other kind of infra required by the developer. Polygon effectively transforms Ethereum into a full-fledged multi-chain system (aka Internet of Blockchains). This multi-chain system is akin to other ones such as Polkadot, Cosmos, Avalanche etc with the advantages of Ethereum’s security, vibrant ecosystem and openness. Company Description
 At EVERSANA, we are proud to be certified as a Great Place to Work across the globe. We’re fueled by our vision to create a healthier world. How? Our global team of more than 7,000 employees is committed to creating and delivering next-generation commercialization services to the life sciences industry. We are grounded in our cultural beliefs and serve more than 650 clients ranging from innovative biotech start-ups to established pharmaceutical companies. Our products, services and solutions help bring innovative therapies to market and support the patients who depend on them. Our jobs, skills and talents are unique, but together we make an impact every day. Join us!
Across our growing organization, we embrace diversity in backgrounds and experiences. Improving patient lives around the world is a priority, and we need people from all backgrounds and swaths of life to help build the future of the healthcare and the life sciences industry. We believe our people make all the difference in cultivating an inclusive culture that embraces our cultural beliefs. We are deliberate and self-reflective about the kind of team and culture we are building. We look for team members that are not only strong in their own aptitudes but also who care deeply about EVERSANA, our people, clients and most importantly, the patients we serve. We are EVERSANA. Job Description
 Position Overview: We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Senior Data Analyst to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have 10+ years of proven experience in data analysis and data warehousing, with a strong proficiency in Snowflake Cloud and DBT. Experience in the healthcare industry is highly desirable. The candidate should also possess hands-on expertise in either Power BI or Tableau, along with the ability to quickly grasp complex business problems and analyze existing data models.

Serving hundreds of the world’s most recognizable brands for the past 30+ years, Magnit offers the industry’s first holistic platform for the modern workforce. Magnit's integrated workforce management (IWM) platform supported by data, software, intelligence, and best-in-class services team is key to our clients’ success. It can adapt quickly to regional or industry economic shifts, and provides the speed, scale, flexibility, transparency, and expertise required to meet an organization’s contingent workforce management, talent strategy and broader organization goals. At Magnit, you’ll work with passionate colleagues who collaborate and deliver meaningful results that positively transform the largest companies around the globe.  About the Role We are seeking a skilled and detail-oriented Data Analyst with advanced SQL experience to join our dynamic team. As a Data Analyst, you will be responsible for collecting, analyzing, and interpreting large datasets to drive business insights and support data-driven decision-making. The ideal candidate should have a strong background in SQL, database management, and data manipulation techniques, along with a passion for uncovering meaningful patterns and trends. Job Description:
Full job description
About Us: SG Analytics (SGA), a Global Insights and Analytics company, focuses on ESG, Data Analytics, and Investment & Market research services. The company has a presence in New York, San Francisco, Austin, Seattle, Toronto, London, Zurich, Pune, Bengaluru, and Hyderabad and growing consistently for the last few years.
SGA is a Great Place To Work (GPTW) certified company, and with its thriving work environment shaped by a growth mindset, abundant learning, and a meritocracy-driven culture, SG Analytics has also been awarded regional best employer in 2016, 2018 & 2020.
Role: Associate Analyst – Investment Research, Fixed Income Research
 Purpose:
The role involves gathering financial information about the companies and securities held by the funds, such as the borrower’s profile, the type of instruments, the industry and sector, the issuance and maturity details, the key financial data and credit metrics of the borrower. The candidate will also be involved in preparing the Fixed Income factsheet covering research and analysis of corporate and sovereign issuers from the credit perspective.
 Responsibilities:
Accurately compiling data related to private debt secondaries including various aspects of the underlying investments and securities held by the funds.
Ensure the accuracy and reliability of information.
Conduct in-depth fundamental credit analysis to produce high-quality research reports covering individual issuers across the globe.
Provide recommendations tied to analysis and assessment of credit risk.
Develop and prepare spreadsheets and models to support analysis of new and existing issuers.
Understanding of capital structure analysis, indenture screening, covenant analysis, and scenario analysis.
Working under pressure to deliver high-quality research in a timely manner.
Flexible to work across multiple projects in the fixed-income domain.
Understanding of macroeconomics could be an added advantage.
 Experience & Skills:
MBA or equivalent in Finance /CFA/CA.
1-2 years of experience in the investment research profile with a broad understanding of financial markets.
Ability to articulate and present viewpoints.
Able to work independently and in a global team set up to take on initiatives with a positive attitude.
Good attention to detail.
Strong oral and written communication skills.
Self-motivated individual with strong analytical ability and entrepreneurial thinking with a high degree of independence and willingness for above-average commitment.
Well-versed with Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and Bloomberg.

Salary: Rs.5,00,000 to 8,00,000 Per Annum + Benefits + Uncapped Commission, with easy opportunity to earn 30% more by commission.
Job Location: 100% Work from Home 
Job Type: Full Time Permanent
Hours: 6 am IST onwards (Australia Shift) 
Company’s India HQ: Coimbatore, Tamil Nadu
Company’s Global HQ: Sydney, Australia
Company’s Main Client Base: USA, UK & Australia
Language Requirements: Excellent English (Must); At least basic Tamil (Preferred)
Key Contacts: CEO, Head of Development & International AM
About Blurn.com:
With Headquarters in Australia, and clients in Australia, UK, & USA, we’re a rapidly growing digital marketing agency with a team of 12+ staff in India. Our main services include: SEO, Paid Search Ads on Google & Bing, Paid & Organic Social Media including Meta (Facebook & Instagram), Retargeting, Websites, Apps, Marketing Automation, GoHighLevel, etc.
About the Role:
As the Senior Digital Marketing Manager, you will be responsible for running the entire digital marketing arm of our business, heading up our digital marketing team, generating leads and sales for our own agency, developing and managing our international clients’ digital marketing strategies to drive awareness, consideration, and most importantly: leads and sales.
You will report directly to the Sydney-based CEO, who is extremely knowledgeable and passionate about digital. You will receive plenty of strategic guidance and support from the CEO, as you will be working closely with the CEO, the Head of Development, and managing other team members. You will have advertising budgets for each client that need to be carefully managed and reported on, besides getting the best-possible performance (leads, sales, at best-possible CPC & CPA).
To be successful, you must have a proven track record of generating leads and sales via digital marketing channels listed below with your own strategic and hands-on work, managing a digital marketing team. You should be able to set up and manage successful campaigns end to end. You will also understand creative and various paid media marketing tactics and possess exceptional English language and interpersonal skills. Both Strategic & Hands-on Execution Responsibilities in Channels will Include: SEO, PPC/SEM, Omni-channel Integration, Marketing Automation, Web Personalisation, Remarketing, Content, Social Media, E-mail, EDM, CRM, GoHighLevel, CRO, Analytics, Mobile, and Video.
To be successful, you must have an excellent grasp of spoken, written and reading English and be able to read digital marketing blogs and documentation to understand, train and implement strategies.

Job Description:
Job detailsHere’s how the job details align with your profile.Pay₹20,000 - ₹30,000 a monthJob typeFull-timeShift and scheduleDay shift LocationLucknow, Uttar Pradesh BenefitsPulled from the full job descriptionFlexible schedule Full job description**Job Summary:**
We are seeking a skilled Power BI Analyst to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in Microsoft Power BI and excellent English communication skills. In this role, you will be responsible for designing and implementing data visualizations and reports that provide actionable insights for business decision-making. Your ability to convey complex data insights in a clear and concise manner is crucial.
**Key Responsibilities:**
- Develop, maintain, and optimize Power BI reports and dashboards to meet business requirements.
- Collaborate with stakeholders to gather and analyze business requirements for reporting needs.
- Create and manage data models, ensuring accuracy and performance in Power BI.
- Translate business needs into technical specifications and actionable insights.
- Prepare and deliver presentations and reports to communicate findings effectively to both technical and non-technical audiences.
- Troubleshoot and resolve issues related to Power BI reports and data sources.
- Stay current with Power BI updates and best practices to enhance reporting capabilities.
- Provide training and support to end-users on Power BI tools and features.
**Qualifications:**
- Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, Data Analytics, or a related field.
- Proven experience in designing, developing, and deploying Power BI solutions.
- Strong proficiency in DAX (Data Analysis Expressions) and Power Query.
- Excellent English communication skills, both written and verbal.
- Ability to present complex data insights in an easily understandable manner.
- Experience with data integration, data warehousing, and ETL processes is a plus.
- Familiarity with SQL and other data management tools is advantageous.
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with attention to detail.
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team in a fast-paced environment.
**Preferred Skills:**
- Certifications in Power BI or related areas.
- Experience with other data visualization tools (e.g., Tableau, QlikView).
- Knowledge of data governance and best practices in data management.
**What We Offer:**
- Competitive salary and benefits package.
- Opportunities for professional growth and development.
- Collaborative and dynamic work environment.
- Flexible working hours and remote work options.
Job Type: Full-time
Schedule:

Job detailsHere’s how the job details align with your profile.Pay₹6,00,000 - ₹7,00,000 a yearJob typeFull-timeShift and scheduleDay shift LocationRemote BenefitsPulled from the full job descriptionCell phone reimbursementCommuter assistanceFlexible scheduleHealth insuranceLife insurancePaid sick timePaid time offShow morechevron down Full job descriptionPosition Summary:
The Program Manager will have the responsibility of implementing a scholarship program nationwide in India, as well as overseeing a team consisting of 2 to 3 individuals.
Key responsibilities:
The major responsibilities are subject to change based on dynamic work requirements.
Administration
● Ensure smooth implementation of various aspects of the program.
● Work proactively keeping in mind program expansion targets.
● Organize and manage student events, both online and offline, ensuring smooth execution and maximum student participation.
● Lead the scholarship interview process, including scheduling, communication, candidate
selection, and initiation of fund disbursement.
Team Management:
● Lead and manage the program team, providing guidance, support, and feedback to ensure the successful implementation of all program activities.
● Train the team on ideal stakeholder relationships, mentoring and adherence to processes for effective implementation of the program.
Coordination for Alumni Relations & Mentorship:
● Work with the Alumni Relations & Mentorship team for building the alumni database and create mentorship programs.
Program Implementation and M&E:
● Manage the outreach activities of the program, ensuring that all students are aware of available resources and opportunities.
● Coordinate with service providers to schedule meetings, events, and sessions, ensuring timely and effective delivery of program activities.
● Conduct surveys with students to gather feedback and assess their needs for placement
training, counseling sessions, career guidance, and other support services.
● Monitor and evaluate the overall effectiveness of the program, identifying areas for improvement and implementing necessary changes to achieve program goals.
● Coordinate with the Monitoring, Evaluation and Learning Division of the organization to collect data on students’ performance regularly, and use it effectively to improve performance of the program, as well as for program development.
Documentation and reporting:
● Track and manage the student database and alumni records, ensuring data integrity and
accessibility.
● Document and report the student journey, including progress, challenges, and achievements, to the management team on a regular basis.
● Ensure that all communications, including emails, meeting notes, and program updates, are accurately documented and stored for future reference.
● Capture success stories and learning from operations of the program
● Support preparation of periodic reports, analyzing the progress of the students, for sharing with stakeholders.
Stakeholder management:
● Manage and coordinate with various stakeholders, including students, parents, service
providers, and other external partners, to ensure effective collaboration and program success.
● Monitor and analyze the effectiveness of communication between the program coordinator and students, making necessary adjustments to improve engagement and outcomes.
● Hold regular discussion sessions with students and understand the effective implementation of the program.
● Facilitate donor and core team visit to the schools/Institutions.
