Job Description:
Job detailsHere’s how the job details align with your profile.Pay₹50,000 - ₹1,00,000 a monthJob typeFull-timeTemporaryShift and scheduleDay shift LocationHimayatnagar, Hyderabad, Telangana BenefitsPulled from the full job descriptionProvident Fund Full job descriptionRole: Analytics Consultant | Experience Level: 3-8 Years | Open Positions : 3Must Have: Very good communication, SQL programming & Power BI Skills. Responsibilities:
 Design, develop, and maintain efficient data model architectures that handle large volumes of data with optimal performance.
 Ensure data models are scalable, maintainable, and adhere to best practices in data management.
 Write, optimize, and maintain complex SQL queries and stored procedures to support BI solutions.
 Develop robust data pipelines/flows for extracting, transforming, and loading data (ETL) from multiple sources into data warehouse/reporting databases.
 Utilize advanced DAX functions to implement complex business logic and KPIs.
 Optimize DAX queries to improve the performance of Power BI reports, ensuring quick and responsive analytics.
 Continuously enhance and refine existing BI reports, focusing on performance improvements and new feature additions.
 Identify, analyze, and resolve issues related to BI reports, including performance bottlenecks and data inaccuracies.
 Proactively implement solutions to improve the overall performance and reliability of BI reports.
 Engage with stakeholders to manage expectations, gather requirements, and provide regular updates on project status.
 Foster a culture of continuous learning and improvement within the BI team.
Desired:
 Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in computer science, Information Systems, or a related field.
 3-8 years of hands-on experience in developing and maintaining Power BI reports, dashboards, and data models.
 Expertise in designing efficient and scalable data models that support robust BI solutions.  Proven track record of working with large datasets and performing advanced-level computations.
 Proficiency in SQL programming, including writing complex queries, stored procedures, and performance tuning.
 Strong skills in writing and optimizing DAX queries and M-query for advanced data manipulation.
 Experience with SAP Datasphere or SAP Analytics Cloud (SAC) is a plus.
 Familiarity with JavaScript or Python is advantageous.
 Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, capable of working effectively with both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
 Ability to work independently as well as part of a team.
Additional Details: Immediate Joiners would be preferred.
Job Types: Full-time, TemporaryContract length: 6 months
Benefits:

 At Amazon, we're working to be the most customer-centric company on earth. To get there, we need exceptionally talented, bright, and customer obsessed people. As a Business Intelligence Engineer for Transportation Engineering Systems Team, (TESS), you will be responsible for developing, enhancing, automating and managing business models/dashboards using strong quantitative skills. You will also build tools and support structures needed to analyze data, deep dive root causes of operational issues or challenges, drive process improvements, build KPIs (Key Performance Indicators) and metrics, and document systems and processes for internal publication.  TESS manages transportation network configuration by working with different internal stakeholders and systems, to deliver desired business outcomes. We work at the intersection of business and systems. Your work will directly influence the decisions and strategy of TESS by gathering customer needs and insights, mining large and diverse data sets. You will work with business leaders, their teams, and their various stakeholders to track various business goals and initiatives. The ideal candidate is a natural self-starter who is comfortable working within a cross functional environment, supporting multiple stakeholders and initiatives. You will have a true hands-on approach, strong analytical skills, including the ability to gain true insights from data, and be an effective communicator. - Collect, identify, and prioritize analytical problem statements to ensure the BI team works on the highest impact projects and earn stakeholder trust.

Job Description: full job descriptionFlexible scheduleHealth insurancePaid time off Full job descriptionAbout the Role: Grade Level (for internal use): 12 S&P Global Market Intelligence The Role: Associate Director Data Scientist Grade 12 The Location: Gurgaon  The Team The candidate will join the Data Science and Data Engineering team in Market Intelligence (MI) Enterprise Solutions (ES) at S&P Global. We work alongside product teams across MI ES on break-through ideas using tools and techniques spanning the entire spectrum of Data Science, Statistics, Machine Learning, Deep Learning, NLP, Gen AI, Operations Research, Data and Machine Learning Engineering. We are responsible for the end-to-end data science life cycle, right from ideation to developing Proof of concepts (PoC) and finally building and maintaining production data science and applications/products/features  This role is a unique opportunity to drive business value for multiple stakeholders and the ideal candidate must have deep design and hands-on development expertise in Statistics, ML, NLP, LLMs, model development and integrating ML solutions with business.  The Impact: This is a great time to be joining a truly global team on a great technology journey. This is a great product covering multi-asset classes in both a pre/post-trade capacity with real-time reporting functionality. If you want to be an integral part of this forward-thinking team with a drive to succeed and the opportunity to enhance your development career and expand your technical skill sets, then this is the role for you. Your challenge will be reducing the “time to market” for products without compromising quality, by using innovation and technical skills.  What’s in it for you: Be a part of an industry leading, Fortune 500 company Be a part of “GREAT PLACE TO WORK” Certified firm Be a part of a ‘People First’ organization that Values Partnership, Integrity, and Discovery to Accelerate Progress Develop and deliver industry-leading software solutions using cutting-edge technologies and the latest toolsets. Plenty of training and development programs that support continuous learning and skill enhancement. Build a fulfilling career with a truly global and leading provider of financial market intelligence, data, and analytics.  Responsibilities: Data Science Strategy: Develop and implement Statistical, Machine Learning, Deep Learning, NLP, Gen AI modeling, development and fine-tuning strategies, best practices, and standards. Contribute towards roadmap and strategy for development and lifecycle implementation Design and Development: Responsible for the design and development of custom ML, Gen AI, NLP, LLM Models for batch and stream processing-based AI ML pipelines including data ingestion, preprocessing modules, search and retrieval, Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG), NLP/LLM model development and ensure the end-to-end solution meets all technical and business requirements, and SLA specifications. Work closely with members of technology and product leads in the design, development, and implementation of the ML model solutions Evaluation: Work closely with the MLOps team to create and maintain robust evaluation solutions and tools to evaluate model performance, accuracy, consistency, reliability, during development, UAT. Identify and implement model optimizations to improve system efficiency. Deployment: Work closely with the MLOps team for the deployment of machine learning models into production environments, ensuring reliability and scalability. Internal Collaboration: Collaborate closely with product teams, business stakeholders, MLOps, machine learning engineers, and software engineers to ensure smooth integration of machine learning models into production systems. Stakeholder Engagement and Collaboration: Collaborate closely with business and PM stakeholders in roadmap planning and implementation efforts and ensure technical milestones align with business requirements. Mentorship: Recruit, develop and mentor talent on the team Provide guidance and mentorship to junior ML scientists, fostering their professional growth and development. Documentation: Maintain comprehensive documentation of ML modeling processes and procedures for reference and knowledge sharing. Standards and Best Practices: Ensure the use of standards, governance and best practices in ML model development, and adherence to model and data governance standards. Problem Solving: Troubleshoot complex issues related to machine learning model development and data pipelines and develop innovative solutions.  Essential Skills  Bachelor's / Master’s or Ph.D degree in Computer Science, Mathematics or Statistics, Computational linguistics, Engineering, or a related field. 10+ years of professional experience in Advanced Analytics / Data Science / Machine Learning / Deep Learning /GenAI Coding experience in Python (Expert Level) to write robust and high standard Machine Learning code; experience with version control (preferably Git) Experience in ML Engineering/ML Ops and Production deployment Hands on project lifecycle experience, from business analysis to productization Experience working with large data sets and distributed computing Strong familiarity with higher level trends in LLMs and open-source platforms  Flexible Working (optional) We pride ourselves on our agility and diversity, and we welcome requests to work flexibly. For most roles, flexible hours and/or an element of remote working are usually possible. Please talk to us at interview about the type of arrangement that is best for you. We will always try to be adaptable wherever we can.  Return to Work Have you taken time out for caring responsibilities and are now looking to return to work? As part of our Return to Work initiative (link to career site page when available), we are encouraging enthusiastic and talented returners to apply, and will actively support your return to the workplace.  S&P Global Market Intelligence At S&P Global Market Intelligence, we know that not all information is important—some of it is vital. Accurate, deep and insightful. We integrate financial and industry data, research and news into tools that help track performance, generate alpha, identify investment ideas, understand competitive and industry dynamics, perform valuation and assess credit risk. Investment professionals, government agencies, corporations and universities globally can gain the intelligence essential to making business and financial decisions with conviction. S&P Global Market Intelligence is a division of S&P Global (NYSE: SPGI), which provides essential intelligence for individuals, companies and governments to make decisions with confidence. For more information, visit www.spglobal.com/marketintelligence . S&P Global has a Securities Disclosure and Trading Policy (“the Policy”) that seeks to mitigate conflicts of interest by monitoring and placing restrictions on personal securities holding and trading. The Policy is designed to promote compliance with global regulations. In some Divisions, pursuant to the Policy’s requirements, candidates at S&P Global may be asked to disclose securities holdings. Some roles may include a trading prohibition and remediation of positions when there is an effective or potential conflict of interest. Employment at S&P Global is contingent upon compliance with the Policy.  Equal Opportunity Employer: S&P Global is an equal opportunity employer and all qualified candidates will receive consideration for employment without regard to race/ethnicity, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, disability, marital status, military veteran status, unemployment status, or any other status protected by law. Only electronic job submissions will be considered for employment. If you need an accommodation during the application process due to a disability, please send an email to: EEO.Compliance@spglobal.com and your request will be forwarded to the appropriate person.  About S&P Global Market Intelligence  At S&P Global Market Intelligence, a division of S&P Global we understand the importance of accurate, deep and insightful information. Our team of experts delivers unrivaled insights and leading data and technology solutions, partnering with customers to expand their perspective, operate with confidence, and make decisions with conviction.  For more information, visit www.spglobal.com/marketintelligence .  What’s In It For You?  Our Purpose: Progress is not a self-starter. It requires a catalyst to be set in motion. Information, imagination, people, technology–the right combination can unlock possibility and change the world.  Our world is in transition and getting more complex by the day. We push past expected observations and seek out new levels of understanding so that we can help companies, governments and individuals make an impact on tomorrow. At S&P Global we transform data into Essential Intelligence®, pinpointing risks and opening possibilities. We Accelerate Progress.  Our People: We're more than 35,000 strong worldwide—so we're able to understand nuances while having a broad perspective. Our team is driven by curiosity and a shared belief that Essential Intelligence can help build a more prosperous future for us all.  From finding new ways to measure sustainability to analyzing energy transition across the supply chain to building workflow solutions that make it easy to tap into insight and apply it. We are changing the way people see things and empowering them to make an impact on the world we live in. We’re committed to a more equitable future and to helping our customers find new, sustainable ways of doing business. We’re constantly seeking new solutions that have progress in mind. Responsibilities: Data Science Strategy: Develop and implement Statistical, Machine Learning, Deep Learning, NLP, Gen AI modeling, development and fine-tuning strategies, best practices, and standards. Contribute towards roadmap and strategy for development and lifecycle implementation Design and Development: Responsible for the design and development of custom ML, Gen AI, NLP, LLM Models for batch and stream processing-based AI ML pipelines including data ingestion, preprocessing modules, search and retrieval, Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG), NLP/LLM model development and ensure the end-to-end solution meets all technical and business requirements, and SLA specifications. Work closely with members of technology and product leads in the design, development, and implementation of the ML model solutions Evaluation: Work closely with the MLOps team to create and maintain robust evaluation solutions and tools to evaluate model performance, accuracy, consistency, reliability, during development, UAT. Identify and implement model optimizations to improve system efficiency. Deployment: Work closely with the MLOps team for the deployment of machine learning models into production environments, ensuring reliability and scalability. Internal Collaboration: Collaborate closely with product teams, business stakeholders, MLOps, machine learning engineers, and software engineers to ensure smooth integration of machine learning models into production systems. Stakeholder Engagement and Collaboration: Collaborate closely with business and PM stakeholders in roadmap planning and implementation efforts and ensure technical milestones align with business requirements. Mentorship: Recruit, develop and mentor talent on the team Provide guidance and mentorship to junior ML scientists, fostering their professional growth and development. Documentation: Maintain comprehensive documentation of ML modeling processes and procedures for reference and knowledge sharing. Standards and Best Practices: Ensure the use of standards, governance and best practices in ML model development, and adherence to model and data governance standards. Problem Solving: Troubleshoot complex issues related to machine learning model development and data pipelines and develop innovative solutions. Company Description
 At Western Digital, our vision is to power global innovation and push the boundaries of technology to make what you thought was once impossible, possible.
At our core, Western Digital is a company of problem solvers. People achieve extraordinary things given the right technology. For decades, we’ve been doing just that. Our technology helped people put a man on the moon.
We are a key partner to some of the largest and highest growth organizations in the world. From energizing the most competitive gaming platforms, to enabling systems to make cities safer and cars smarter and more connected, to powering the data centers behind many of the world’s biggest companies and public cloud, Western Digital is fueling a brighter, smarter future.
Binge-watch any shows, use social media or shop online lately? You’ll find Western Digital supporting the storage infrastructure behind many of these platforms. And, that flash memory card that captures and preserves your most precious moments? That’s us, too.
We offer an expansive portfolio of technologies, storage devices and platforms for business and consumers alike. Our data-centric solutions are comprised of the Western Digital®, G-Technology™, SanDisk® and WD® brands.
Today’s exceptional challenges require your unique skills. It’s You & Western Digital. Together, we’re the next BIG thing in data. Job Description
 We are seeking an experienced IT Analyst with a minimum of 6 years of hands-on experience in the field of Information Technology. The ideal candidate will possess expert-level skills in Python, with a specific focus on machine learning. Additionally, proficiency in Docker and Web UI build skills is essential for this role.

Job Description:
Job detailsHere’s how the job details align with your profile.Job typeFull-time LocationGurugram, Haryana Full job descriptionOverview: We are seeking a skilled Climate/Carbon Analyst to join our team and contribute to our efforts in understanding and mitigating the impacts of climate change. The ideal candidate will possess a strong background in environmental science, data analysis, and policy research, with a focus on carbon emissions and climate modeling. This role involves analyzing complex data sets, assessing carbon footprints, identifying areas for emission reductions, and providing strategic recommendations to support our sustainability objectives.
Responsibilities:
1. Data Analysis: Collect, process, and analyze large datasets related to carbon emissions, climate trends, energy consumption, and environmental impacts.
2. Carbon Footprint Assessment: Conduct comprehensive assessments of carbon footprints for various activities, processes, and products within the organization or client operations.
3. Climate Modeling: Utilize climate modeling tools and techniques to forecast future climate scenarios, assess risks, and identify opportunities for adaptation and mitigation.
4. Policy Research: Stay abreast of global, regional, and local climate policies, regulations, and initiatives. Analyze their potential impact on operations and recommend strategies to ensure compliance and promote sustainability.
5. Emission Reduction Strategies: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to develop and implement strategies for reducing carbon emissions, improving energy efficiency, and promoting sustainable practices.
6. Reporting and Documentation: Prepare detailed reports, presentations, and documentation summarizing key findings, recommendations, and progress towards sustainability goals. Ensure accuracy and clarity in communication to stakeholders.
7. Stakeholder Engagement: Engage with internal and external stakeholders, including government agencies, industry partners, NGOs, and community groups, to exchange knowledge, gather insights, and build partnerships to advance climate goals.
8. Continuous Improvement: Identify opportunities for process optimization, technology adoption, and innovation to enhance the effectiveness and efficiency of carbon management initiatives.
Requirements:
1. Bachelor's degree in Environmental Science, Sustainability, Climate Science, Engineering, or related field. Master's degree preferred.
2. Proven experience in climate analysis, carbon accounting, greenhouse gas inventorying, or related areas.
3. Proficiency in data analysis and visualization tools (e.g., Excel, Python, R, GIS).
4. Familiarity with climate models, emission estimation methodologies, and sustainability frameworks (e.g., GHG Protocol, IPCC guidelines).
5. Strong understanding of climate policy, regulations, and international agreements (e.g., Paris Agreement, Clean Air Act).
6. Excellent communication skills, with the ability to convey technical information to diverse audiences effectively.
7. Ability to work independently, manage multiple projects simultaneously, and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment.
8. Passion for environmental sustainability and a commitment to driving positive change.
Note: This job description is intended to convey information essential to understanding the scope of the position and is not an exhaustive list of skills, efforts, duties, responsibilities, or working conditions associated with it. Management reserves the right to modify duties or assign other duties as necessary.
Location Requirement: This role is based in India, and we kindly request that only candidates located in India apply for this position.

About the Role:
SaralTech is seeking a motivated and detail-oriented Healthcare Research Intern to join our team. As an intern, you will assist in conducting research and analysis on healthcare-related topics, contributing to projects that aim to enhance our understanding of the healthcare industry.
Key Responsibilities:
- Assist in gathering and analyzing healthcare data from various sources.
- Conduct literature reviews and summarize findings on healthcare trends, policies, and innovations.
- Support research projects by collecting and organizing data, preparing reports, and creating presentations.
- Collaborate with team members to contribute to research strategies and project development.
- Stay updated on current developments in the healthcare industry to inform research efforts.
Requirements:
- Pursuing or recently completed a degree in healthcare, life sciences, public health, or a related field.
- Strong research and analytical skills with attention to detail.
- Ability to synthesize complex information into clear and concise reports.
- Familiarity with healthcare industry trends and terminology.
- Proficiency in MS Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint).
- Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
*Benefits:*
- Gain hands-on experience in healthcare research.
- Work in a dynamic and supportive environment.
- Opportunity to contribute to meaningful projects in the healthcare sector.
- Networking and mentorship opportunities.
If you are passionate about healthcare and eager to contribute to impactful research projects, we encourage you to apply.

**Job Description:**
We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated Data Science and AI Developer to join our dynamic team. As a Data Science and AI Developer, you will be responsible for leveraging cutting-edge technologies to develop innovative solutions that drive business insights and enhance decision-making processes.
**Key Responsibilities:**
1. Develop and deploy machine learning models for predictive analytics, classification, clustering, and anomaly detection.
2. Design and implement algorithms for data mining, pattern recognition, and natural language processing.
3. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand business requirements and translate them into technical solutions.
4. Utilize advanced statistical techniques to analyze complex datasets and extract actionable insights.
5. Implement scalable data pipelines for data ingestion, preprocessing, feature engineering, and model training.
6. Stay updated with the latest advancements in data science, machine learning, and artificial intelligence research.
7. Optimize model performance and scalability through experimentation and iteration.
8. Communicate findings and results to stakeholders through reports, presentations, and visualizations.
9. Ensure compliance with data privacy regulations and best practices in data handling and security.
10. Mentor junior team members and provide technical guidance and support.
**Requirements:**
1. Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Data Science, Statistics, or a related field.
2. Proven experience in developing and deploying machine learning models in production environments.
3. Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, R, or Scala, with strong software engineering skills.
4. Hands-on experience with machine learning libraries/frameworks such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-learn, or Spark MLlib.
5. Solid understanding of data structures, algorithms, and computer science fundamentals.
6. Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to think creatively to overcome challenges.
7. Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to work effectively in a collaborative team environment.
8. Certification in Data Science, Machine Learning, or Artificial Intelligence (e.g., Coursera, edX, Udacity, etc.).
9. Experience with cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud is a plus.
10. Familiarity with big data technologies (e.g., Hadoop, Spark, Kafka) is an advantage.

Job Description:
Job detailsHere’s how the job details align with your profile.Job typeFull-time LocationGurugram, Haryana Full job descriptionOverview: We are seeking a skilled Climate/Carbon Analyst to join our team and contribute to our efforts in understanding and mitigating the impacts of climate change. The ideal candidate will possess a strong background in environmental science, data analysis, and policy research, with a focus on carbon emissions and climate modeling. This role involves analyzing complex data sets, assessing carbon footprints, identifying areas for emission reductions, and providing strategic recommendations to support our sustainability objectives.
Responsibilities:
1. Data Analysis: Collect, process, and analyze large datasets related to carbon emissions, climate trends, energy consumption, and environmental impacts.
2. Carbon Footprint Assessment: Conduct comprehensive assessments of carbon footprints for various activities, processes, and products within the organization or client operations.
3. Climate Modeling: Utilize climate modeling tools and techniques to forecast future climate scenarios, assess risks, and identify opportunities for adaptation and mitigation.
4. Policy Research: Stay abreast of global, regional, and local climate policies, regulations, and initiatives. Analyze their potential impact on operations and recommend strategies to ensure compliance and promote sustainability.
5. Emission Reduction Strategies: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to develop and implement strategies for reducing carbon emissions, improving energy efficiency, and promoting sustainable practices.
6. Reporting and Documentation: Prepare detailed reports, presentations, and documentation summarizing key findings, recommendations, and progress towards sustainability goals. Ensure accuracy and clarity in communication to stakeholders.
7. Stakeholder Engagement: Engage with internal and external stakeholders, including government agencies, industry partners, NGOs, and community groups, to exchange knowledge, gather insights, and build partnerships to advance climate goals.
8. Continuous Improvement: Identify opportunities for process optimization, technology adoption, and innovation to enhance the effectiveness and efficiency of carbon management initiatives.
Requirements:
1. Bachelor's degree in Environmental Science, Sustainability, Climate Science, Engineering, or related field. Master's degree preferred.
2. Proven experience in climate analysis, carbon accounting, greenhouse gas inventorying, or related areas.
3. Proficiency in data analysis and visualization tools (e.g., Excel, Python, R, GIS).
4. Familiarity with climate models, emission estimation methodologies, and sustainability frameworks (e.g., GHG Protocol, IPCC guidelines).
5. Strong understanding of climate policy, regulations, and international agreements (e.g., Paris Agreement, Clean Air Act).
6. Excellent communication skills, with the ability to convey technical information to diverse audiences effectively.
7. Ability to work independently, manage multiple projects simultaneously, and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment.
8. Passion for environmental sustainability and a commitment to driving positive change.
Note: This job description is intended to convey information essential to understanding the scope of the position and is not an exhaustive list of skills, efforts, duties, responsibilities, or working conditions associated with it. Management reserves the right to modify duties or assign other duties as necessary.
Location Requirement: This role is based in India, and we kindly request that only candidates located in India apply for this position.

**Job Description:**
We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated Data Science and AI Developer to join our dynamic team. As a Data Science and AI Developer, you will be responsible for leveraging cutting-edge technologies to develop innovative solutions that drive business insights and enhance decision-making processes.
**Key Responsibilities:**
1. Develop and deploy machine learning models for predictive analytics, classification, clustering, and anomaly detection.
2. Design and implement algorithms for data mining, pattern recognition, and natural language processing.
3. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand business requirements and translate them into technical solutions.
4. Utilize advanced statistical techniques to analyze complex datasets and extract actionable insights.
5. Implement scalable data pipelines for data ingestion, preprocessing, feature engineering, and model training.
6. Stay updated with the latest advancements in data science, machine learning, and artificial intelligence research.
7. Optimize model performance and scalability through experimentation and iteration.
8. Communicate findings and results to stakeholders through reports, presentations, and visualizations.
9. Ensure compliance with data privacy regulations and best practices in data handling and security.
10. Mentor junior team members and provide technical guidance and support.
**Requirements:**
1. Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Data Science, Statistics, or a related field.
2. Proven experience in developing and deploying machine learning models in production environments.
3. Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, R, or Scala, with strong software engineering skills.
4. Hands-on experience with machine learning libraries/frameworks such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-learn, or Spark MLlib.
5. Solid understanding of data structures, algorithms, and computer science fundamentals.
6. Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to think creatively to overcome challenges.
7. Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to work effectively in a collaborative team environment.
8. Certification in Data Science, Machine Learning, or Artificial Intelligence (e.g., Coursera, edX, Udacity, etc.).
9. Experience with cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud is a plus.
10. Familiarity with big data technologies (e.g., Hadoop, Spark, Kafka) is an advantage.
Data Manipulation and Analysis : NumPy, Pandas
Data Visualization : Matplotlib, Seaborn, Power BI
Machine Learning Libraries : Scikit-learn, TensorFlow, Keras
Statistical Analysis : SciPy
Web Scrapping : Scrapy
IDE : PyCharm, Google Colab

Job detailsHere’s how the job details align with your profile.Pay₹8,00,000 - ₹12,00,000 a yearJob typeFull-timeFresherPermanentShift and scheduleNight shiftEvening shiftDay shiftMonday to Friday LocationRemote BenefitsPulled from the full job descriptionHealth insurancePaid sick timeProvident FundWork from home Full job descriptionJob Description: Assistant Manager - Fraud and Chargeback
Overview
We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated Assistant Manager - Fraud and Chargeback to join Miko Customer Support team. The ideal candidate will have extensive experience working with Stripe and PayPal, a proven track record in improving chargeback win rates, reducing chargebacks, and investigating fraudulent transactions. This role requires excellent communication skills, the ability to manage a team, and effective coordination with the operations and accounts teams. The candidate must also be open to communicating with customers as needed.
Key Responsibilities
Fraud Prevention and Management
- Monitor and analyze transactions to identify and prevent fraudulent activities.
- Implement and refine fraud detection strategies using Stripe and PayPal tools.
- Investigate and resolve suspected fraudulent transactions promptly.
Chargeback Management
- Handle chargeback disputes from initiation to resolution.
- Develop and implement strategies to improve chargeback win rates.
- Work closely with the accounts team to ensure accurate and timely processing of chargebacks.
Team Management
- Lead, mentor, and manage a team of fraud and chargeback analysts.
- Conduct regular training sessions to keep the team updated on the latest fraud detection techniques and chargeback management processes.
- Monitor team performance and provide constructive feedback.
Cross-Departmental Coordination
- Collaborate with the operations team to ensure seamless handling of fraud and chargeback cases.
- Work with the accounts team to reconcile transactions and manage financial discrepancies.
- Coordinate with customer support teams, utilizing tools like Zendesk, to ensure excellent customer service.
Customer Interaction
- Engage with customers to resolve disputes and provide clear communication regarding fraud and chargeback cases.
- Handle escalations and provide satisfactory resolutions to customer complaints.
Reporting and Analysis
- Generate and analyze reports on fraud trends, chargeback rates, and team performance.
- Present findings and recommendations to senior management to drive continuous improvement.
Required Qualifications
Experience
- Proven experience working with Stripe and PayPal.
- Demonstrated success in improving chargeback win rates and reducing chargebacks.
- Experience in fraud investigation and management.
- Prior experience of at least 2 years in managing a team of analysts. Overall experience at least 5 years.
Skills
- Strong analytical skills with the ability to interpret data and make informed decisions.
- Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal.
- Proficiency in using Zendesk or similar customer support tools (preferred).
- Ability to work effectively in evening and night shifts as required.
Personal Attributes
- Detail-oriented with a proactive approach to problem-solving.
- Ability to work under pressure and manage multiple priorities.
- Strong leadership qualities with the ability to motivate and develop team members.
- Customer-focused mindset with a commitment to delivering high-quality service.

Team Management
- Lead, mentor, and manage a team of fraud and chargeback analysts.
- Conduct regular training sessions to keep the team updated on the latest fraud detection techniques and chargeback management processes.
- Monitor team performance and provide constructive feedback.
Cross-Departmental Coordination
- Collaborate with the operations team to ensure seamless handling of fraud and chargeback cases.
- Work with the accounts team to reconcile transactions and manage financial discrepancies.
- Coordinate with customer support teams, utilizing tools like Zendesk, to ensure excellent customer service.
Customer Interaction
- Engage with customers to resolve disputes and provide clear communication regarding fraud and chargeback cases.
- Handle escalations and provide satisfactory resolutions to customer complaints.
Reporting and Analysis
- Generate and analyze reports on fraud trends, chargeback rates, and team performance.
- Present findings and recommendations to senior management to drive continuous improvement.
Required Qualifications
Experience
- Proven experience working with Stripe and PayPal.
- Demonstrated success in improving chargeback win rates and reducing chargebacks.
- Experience in fraud investigation and management.
- Prior experience of at least 2 years in managing a team of analysts. Overall experience at least 5 years.
Skills
- Strong analytical skills with the ability to interpret data and make informed decisions.
- Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal.
- Proficiency in using Zendesk or similar customer support tools (preferred).
- Ability to work effectively in evening and night shifts as required.
Personal Attributes
- Detail-oriented with a proactive approach to problem-solving.
- Ability to work under pressure and manage multiple priorities.
- Strong leadership qualities with the ability to motivate and develop team members.
- Customer-focused mindset with a commitment to delivering high-quality service.
Job Types: Full-time, Permanent, Fresher
Benefits:

Job Description: Job detailsHere’s how the job details align with your profile.Job typeFull-timeShift and scheduleRotational shift LocationGurugram, Haryana Full job descriptionSkill required: Quality Checks - Operational Audit & Compliance Designation: Quality Assurance Analyst Qualifications:Any Graduation  Years of Experience:3 to 5 years  Language - Ability:English - Expert  About Accenture Accenture is a global professional services company with leading capabilities in digital, cloud and security.Combining unmatched experience and specialized skills across more than 40 industries, we offer Strategy and Consulting, Technology and Operations services, and Accenture Song— all powered by the world’s largest network of Advanced Technology and Intelligent Operations centers. Our 699,000 people deliver on the promise of technology and human ingenuity every day, serving clients in more than 120 countries. We embrace the power of change to create value and shared success for our clients, people, shareholders, partners and communities.Visit us at www.accenture.com  What would you do? You will be aligned with our Customer Support vertical and help us in managing/ resolving customers query, handling escalations and complaints of the dissatisfied customers & giving best resolutions. You will also be responsible for closing the fault and complaints within SLA s. Quality control is a process by which entities review the quality of all factors involved in production The Operational Audit & Compliance team focuses on auditing and managing effective implementation and delivery of functional processes within operations to mitigate risks. The role may require for you to have a good understanding of anti-corruption, BCM and infosec policies, records management and contractor controls. The team is responsible for establishing processes to validate the effectiveness and drive improvements wherever required. What are we looking for? •Microsoft Excel •Quality Management •Adaptable and flexible •Agility for quick learning •Written and verbal communication •Ability to work well in a team •Commitment to quality •Quality Assurance (QA)  Roles and Responsibilities: •In this role you are required to do analysis and solving of lower-complexity problems • Your day to day interaction is with peers within Accenture before updating supervisors • In this role you may have limited exposure with clients and/or Accenture management • You will be given moderate level instruction on daily work tasks and detailed instructions on new assignments • The decisions you make impact your own work and may impact the work of others • You will be an individual contributor as a part of a team, with a focused scope of work • Please note that this role may require you to work in rotational shifts  Any Graduation You must create an Indeed account before continuing to the company website to applyApply nowsave-iconReport job Quality Assurance Analyst jobs in Gurugram, HaryanaJobs at Accenture in Gurugram, HaryanaQuality Assurance Analyst salaries in Gurugram, Haryana

Job Description: Job detailsHere’s how the job details align with your profile.Shift and scheduleNight shiftRotational shift LocationAhmedabad, Gujarat BenefitsPulled from the full job descriptionFlexible scheduleHealth insurancePaid time off Full job descriptionAbout the Role: Grade Level (for internal use): 07 The Role: Data Analyst  The Location: Ahmedabad  T he Team: Security Management team aims to create an integrated risk management framework by interconnecting security reference identifiers. We work on product focused integration processes aimed at building a cross referenced framework which help create value for our clients. The team deals in ingestion of global reference identifiers from multiple vendors daily , along with running multiple checks on the database for various metrics. The team is also involved in resolving client issues with real time data corrections through vendor interactions. A section of the team is responsible for quality of the database by following sigma approach, making the database better than the industry standard.  The Impact: Data is sourced from various Sources/Vendors and hence it becomes imperative to collect, analyze and ingest data within communicated SLAs and with best of quality.  Data ingested via different workflows has direct impact on downstream collection process and front-end information being utilized by Clients in decision-making.  Products like Xpressfeed and GICRS are fed by data ingested by researchers and hence very critical from cross-referencing perspective  What’s in it for y ou: This position is an excellent steppingstone to understand Industry dynamism.  Learning about various market driving factors like Credit Ratings, Financials, Golden Copy Reports etc  Opportunity to venture into the field of data analysis and explore the world of Automation and Artificial Intelligence if have a knack for the same  Being a part of Group driven by principles and challenging roles provides multiple path for growth and pool of opportunities to learn and excel.  Responsibilities : Ingestion and maintenance of third-party feed into the database and ensuring smooth flow to product  Understand the working of the dataset, be aware of the workflows and have good working knowledge of work tools  Deliver on predefined individual and team targets including delivering outcomes with quality and excellence.  Stay abreast of updated guidelines and policies  Project planning, execution and control i.e. end to end accountability  Timely and crisp communication to Management and researchers about work in progress and challenges  Collaborate with other teams in department and global teams to achieve organizati onal goals and promote diversity  Knowledge share, policy documentation, Quality control initiatives, Process review, Mentorship, and talent development  Ideate and execute Process improvement and Automation projects  What We’re Looking For: Basic Qualifications : Post Graduate Degree (Major Finance)  Good Written and Verbal Communication  Strong command over Financial Markets , Corporate Actions & Financial Products (Equity, Derivatives & Debt Instruments)  Analytical mindset and strong in logical reasoning  Well versed with secondary research and Microsoft Office  Ability to prioritize, multi-task and effective Time Utilization/ Project Management skills  An inquisitive and investigative nature.  A Positive attitude, strong interest in research, flair for writing and an eye for detail.  Ability to interact with many levels and to face and deal with issues in a mature and professional manner  Comfortable to work in rotational shifts, night shift and flexible hours  Preferred Qualifications : Certification in MS-office  Working knowledge of Excel Macro & Data Visualization Tools  Basic Knowledge on developing and executing SQL Queries  About S&P Global Market Intelligence  At S&P Global Market Intelligence, a division of S&P Global we understand the importance of accurate, deep and insightful information. Our team of experts delivers unrivaled insights and leading data and technology solutions, partnering with customers to expand their perspective, operate with confidence, and make decisions with conviction.  For more information, visit www.spglobal.com/marketintelligence .  What’s In It For You?  Our Purpose: Progress is not a self-starter. It requires a catalyst to be set in motion. Information, imagination, people, technology–the right combination can unlock possibility and change the world.  Our world is in transition and getting more complex by the day. We push past expected observations and seek out new levels of understanding so that we can help companies, governments and individuals make an impact on tomorrow. At S&P Global we transform data into Essential Intelligence®, pinpointing risks and opening possibilities. We Accelerate Progress.  Our People: We're more than 35,000 strong worldwide—so we're able to understand nuances while having a broad perspective. Our team is driven by curiosity and a shared belief that Essential Intelligence can help build a more prosperous future for us all.  From finding new ways to measure sustainability to analyzing energy transition across the supply chain to building workflow solutions that make it easy to tap into insight and apply it. We are changing the way people see things and empowering them to make an impact on the world we live in. We’re committed to a more equitable future and to helping our customers find new, sustainable ways of doing business. We’re constantly seeking new solutions that have progress in mind. Join us and help create the critical insights that truly make a difference.  Our Values: Integrity, Discovery, Partnership  At S&P Global, we focus on Powering Global Markets. Throughout our history, the world's leading organizations have relied on us for the Essential Intelligence they need to make confident decisions about the road ahead. We start with a foundation of integrity in all we do, bring a spirit of discovery to our work, and collaborate in close partnership with each other and our customers to achieve shared goals.  Benefits: We take care of you, so you can take care of business. We care about our people. That’s why we provide everything you—and your career—need to thrive at S&P Global.  Our benefits include: Health & Wellness: Health care coverage designed for the mind and body.  Flexible Downtime: Generous time off helps keep you energized for your time on.  Continuous Learning: Access a wealth of resources to grow your career and learn valuable new skills.  Invest in Your Future: Secure your financial future through competitive pay, retirement planning, a continuing education program with a company-matched student loan contribution, and financial wellness programs.  Family Friendly Perks: It’s not just about you. S&P Global has perks for your partners and little ones, too, with some best-in class benefits for families.  Beyond the Basics: From retail discounts to referral incentive awards—small perks can make a big difference. For more information on benefits by country visit: https://spgbenefits.com/benefit-summaries  Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion at S&P Global: At S&P Global, we believe diversity fuels creative insights, equity unlocks opportunity, and inclusion drives growth and innovation – Powering Global Markets. Our commitment centers on our global workforce, ensuring that our people are empowered to bring their whole selves to work. It doesn’t stop there, we strive to better reflect and serve the communities in which we live and work, and advocate for greater opportunity for all.  -----------------------------------------------------------  Equal Opportunity Employer S&P Global is an equal opportunity employer and all qualified candidates will receive consideration for employment without regard to race/ethnicity, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, disability, marital status, military veteran status, unemployment status, or any other status protected by law. Only electronic job submissions will be considered for employment.  If you need an accommodation during the application process due to a disability, please send an email to: EEO.Compliance@spglobal.com and your request will be forwarded to the appropriate person. Job detailsHere’s how the job details align with your profile.Pay₹2,000 - ₹4,000 a monthJob typeInternshipShift and scheduleMonday to Friday LocationRemote BenefitsPulled from the full job descriptionWork from home Full job descriptionAs a UI/UX design intern at DietGhar.com, you will have the opportunity to work on exciting projects and contribute to the evolution of our digital platform. We are looking for a talented individual who is proficient in Figma, Adobe Illustrator, UI & UX design, User Interface Development, and Wireframing.
Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:
1. Collaborating with the design team to create visually appealing and user-friendly interfaces for our website and mobile app.2. Conducting user research and gathering feedback to improve the overall user experience.3. Creating wireframes and prototypes to communicate design ideas and concepts.4. Working closely with developers to ensure design consistency and quality throughout the development process.5. Staying up-to-date on industry trends and best practices to continuously enhance our design strategy.
If you are passionate about creating exceptional user experiences and eager to gain hands-on experience in the field of UI/UX design, then we want to hear from you! Join us at DietGhar.com and bring your creativity and expertise to the table.
Who can apply

Position Summary:
The Data Analyst is responsible for exploring, cleaning, and preparing the data for the data mining project. They perform descriptive and exploratory data analysis, such as summarizing, visualizing, and profiling the data, and identify any anomalies, outliers, or missing values. They also apply various data mining techniques, such as clustering, classification, association, and regression, to discover patterns and insights from the data. The data analyst needs to have a strong background in statistics, mathematics, and data analysis tools and methods, such as R, SAS, Excel, and Tableau.

Job Description:
Job detailsHere’s how the job details align with your profile.Pay₹20,000 - ₹30,000 a monthJob typeFull-timePermanentShift and scheduleDay shift LocationBengaluru, Karnataka BenefitsPulled from the full job descriptionCell phone reimbursementHealth insuranceProvident Fund Full job descriptionJob Title: Research Analyst
Location: Bangalore
Department: Investment Advisory
Reports to: Director
Job Type: Full-time
Job Summary:
The Research Analyst is responsible for conducting in-depth analysis and providing insights on various financial instruments, markets, and economic trends. The role supports the investment team by delivering high-quality research that informs investment strategies and recommendations for clients.
Key Responsibilities:
1. Market Analysis:
- Monitor and analyze financial markets, including equities, fixed income, commodities, and currencies.
- Track economic indicators, industry trends, and geopolitical events that may impact investment decisions.
2. Securities Research:
- Conduct detailed analysis of individual securities, including stocks, bonds, mutual funds, and ETFs.
- Develop financial models to forecast company performance and valuation.
- Provide buy, hold, or sell recommendations based on thorough research.
3. Industry and Sector Analysis:
- Analyze specific industries or sectors to identify key trends, risks, and opportunities.
- Compile and present comprehensive reports on industry outlooks.
4. Data Collection and Management:
- Gather and organize data from various sources, including financial statements, market reports, and news outlets.
- Maintain up-to-date databases of relevant financial and economic information.
5. Report Writing:
- Prepare research reports, investment memos, and presentations that communicate findings to internal teams and clients.
- Produce regular market updates, newsletters, and investment commentary.
6. Collaboration and Communication:
- Work closely with portfolio managers, investment advisors, and other team members to support investment decisions.
- Present research findings in meetings and client presentations.
7. Risk Assessment:
- Assess risks associated with investment opportunities and provide recommendations for mitigating these risks.
- Stay informed about regulatory changes and their potential impact on investment strategies.
8. Client Support:
- Assist in developing customized investment strategies and portfolios for clients.
- Respond to client inquiries with well-researched and timely information.
Qualifications:
- Education:
- Bachelor’s degree in Finance, Economics, Business, or a related field.
- NISM, Advanced degrees (e.g., MBA) or certifications (e.g., CFA, CFP) are desirable.
- Experience:
- 2-4 years of experience in investment research, financial analysis, or a related role.
- Experience within an investment advisory or asset management firm is preferred.
- Skills:
- Strong analytical and quantitative skills with proficiency in financial modeling.
- Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
- Proficiency in financial research tools and software (e.g., Bloomberg, Reuters, Excel).
- Ability to interpret complex data and present clear, actionable insights.
- Strong understanding of financial markets and investment principles.
- Personal Attributes:
- Detail-oriented with a strong commitment to accuracy and thoroughness.
- Ability to work under pressure and meet tight deadlines.
- Proactive and curious, with a strong desire to continuously learn and improve.
Work Environment:
- The Research Analyst will primarily work in an office environment but may occasionally be required to attend conferences, industry events, or client meetings.
- The role may require extended hours during peak periods or in response to market events.
Job Types: Full-time, Permanent
Benefits:

Job detailsHere’s how the job details align with your profile.Pay₹3,09,305.77 - ₹11,82,766.56 a yearJob typeFull-time LocationBengaluru, Karnataka Full job descriptionJr. Data Scientist
Experience Level:-
6 - 8 years working across Financial Services, Healthcare, Insurance, and Manufacturing Domain preferably in firms specializing in Data and analytics ( 3 -5 years of experience)
Location:-  Bengaluru/Solapur
Job Description:-
We are seeking a highly skilled Data Scientist to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Data Science, Statistics, or a related field and proven experience as a Data Science Developer, Data Scientist, or similar role. Our Expectation is in three parts.
Responsibilities:-
As part of Data Science team, work extensively with the team and senior management in evolving the right Go-To-Market strategies, assisting the Sales Team in acquiring new customers, and proactively identifying opportunities through account mining● Use statistical and machine learning techniques to develop predictive models, algorithms, and data products.● Work with complex data sets to extract insights and develop actionable recommendations for business stakeholders.● Design, develop and implement machine learning pipelines and production-ready systems that handle high traffic and real-time data.● Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate data science models into business systems and applications.● Create and maintain documentation on data science models, algorithms, and pipelines.● Keep up to date with the latest developments in machine learning, data science, and related fields and apply them to business problems as needed.● Develop natural language processing, text understanding, classification, pattern recognition, recommendation, targeting, ranking, or similar systems.● Troubleshoot and solve issues with data pipelines, machine learning models, and data systems.● Develop and maintain APIs for model deployment.
Requirements:-
● Bachelor's or Master's in Computer Science, Data Science, Statistics, or a related field: Fundamental for understanding the theoretical aspects of the role.● Proficiency in Statistics candidate should possess a strong mathematical foundation, particularly in statistics including statistical analysis, hypothesis testing, and data modeling to derive actionable insights from complex data sets.● Proficiency in AI/ML Models: Candidates must have proven experience in developing machine learning models and algorithms with a deep understanding of various machine learning frameworks and libraries.● They should be skilled in Python programming and be capable of building APIs to deploy machine learning models.● Proficiency in Data Science Implementation Best Practices and Emerging Trends● Experience with cloud services such as GCP, Azure, and AWS is desired. They should also be familiar with Agile development methodologies and distributed data/computing tools.● Proficient in SQL and experience with big data platforms like Hadoop, Spark, or similar technologies● Strong mathematical skills (e.g., statistics, algebra): Fundamental for data modeling and analysis.● Expertise in LLMs - OpenAI, Gemini etc● Experience with machine learning frameworks (like Keras or PyTorch) and libraries (like scikit-learn● Strong experience in data wrangling, data cleaning, data preprocessing, and data visualization using tools such as Pandas, NumPy, and Matplotlib.● Experience with distributed data/computing tools● Knowledge of database systems such as MySQL, MongoDB, and PostgreSQL and familiarity with SQL and NoSQL databases● Experience with natural language processing (NLP) techniques such as sentiment analysis, text classification, and topic modeling, and proficiency in using NLP libraries such as NLTK, spaCy, and Gensim
Job Type: Full-time
Experience:

We’re AtkinsRéalis, a world-leading Design, Engineering, and Project Management organization. Created by the integration of long-standing organizations dating back to 1911, we are a world-leading professional services and project management company dedicated to engineering a better future for our planet and its people. We create sustainable solutions that connect people, data, and technology to transform the world's infrastructure and energy systems. We deploy global capabilities locally to our clients and deliver unique end-to-end services across the whole life cycle of an asset including consulting, advisory & environmental services, intelligent networks & cybersecurity, design & engineering, procurement, project & construction management, operations & maintenance, decommissioning and capital. The breadth and depth of our capabilities are delivered to clients in key strategic sectors such as Engineering Services, Nuclear, Operations & Maintenance, and Capital.
News and information are available at www.atkinsrealis.com or follow us on LinkedIn.
Our teams are proud to deliver on some of the most prestigious projects across the world. It's thanks to our talented people and their diverse thinking, expertise, and knowledge. Join us and you'll be part of our genuinely collaborative environment, where everyone is supported to make the most of their talents and expertise.
When it comes to work-life balance, AtkinsRéalis is a great place to be. So, let's discuss how our flexible and remote working policies can support your priorities. We're passionate about our work while valuing each other equally. So, ask us about some of our recent pledges for Women's Equality and being a 'Disability Confident' and 'Inclusive Employer’.

Job Description:
Job detailsHere’s how the job details align with your profile.Pay₹20,000 - ₹30,000 a monthJob typeFull-timePermanentShift and scheduleDay shift LocationBengaluru, Karnataka BenefitsPulled from the full job descriptionCell phone reimbursementHealth insuranceProvident Fund Full job descriptionJob Title: Research Analyst
Location: Bangalore
Department: Investment Advisory
Reports to: Director
Job Type: Full-time
Job Summary:
The Research Analyst is responsible for conducting in-depth analysis and providing insights on various financial instruments, markets, and economic trends. The role supports the investment team by delivering high-quality research that informs investment strategies and recommendations for clients.
Key Responsibilities:
1. Market Analysis:
- Monitor and analyze financial markets, including equities, fixed income, commodities, and currencies.
- Track economic indicators, industry trends, and geopolitical events that may impact investment decisions.
2. Securities Research:
- Conduct detailed analysis of individual securities, including stocks, bonds, mutual funds, and ETFs.
- Develop financial models to forecast company performance and valuation.
- Provide buy, hold, or sell recommendations based on thorough research.
3. Industry and Sector Analysis:
- Analyze specific industries or sectors to identify key trends, risks, and opportunities.
- Compile and present comprehensive reports on industry outlooks.
4. Data Collection and Management:
- Gather and organize data from various sources, including financial statements, market reports, and news outlets.
- Maintain up-to-date databases of relevant financial and economic information.
5. Report Writing:
- Prepare research reports, investment memos, and presentations that communicate findings to internal teams and clients.
- Produce regular market updates, newsletters, and investment commentary.
6. Collaboration and Communication:
- Work closely with portfolio managers, investment advisors, and other team members to support investment decisions.
- Present research findings in meetings and client presentations.
7. Risk Assessment:
- Assess risks associated with investment opportunities and provide recommendations for mitigating these risks.
- Stay informed about regulatory changes and their potential impact on investment strategies.
8. Client Support:
- Assist in developing customized investment strategies and portfolios for clients.
- Respond to client inquiries with well-researched and timely information.
Qualifications:
- Education:
- Bachelor’s degree in Finance, Economics, Business, or a related field.
- NISM, Advanced degrees (e.g., MBA) or certifications (e.g., CFA, CFP) are desirable.
- Experience:
- 2-4 years of experience in investment research, financial analysis, or a related role.
- Experience within an investment advisory or asset management firm is preferred.
- Skills:
- Strong analytical and quantitative skills with proficiency in financial modeling.
- Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
- Proficiency in financial research tools and software (e.g., Bloomberg, Reuters, Excel).
- Ability to interpret complex data and present clear, actionable insights.
- Strong understanding of financial markets and investment principles.
- Personal Attributes:
- Detail-oriented with a strong commitment to accuracy and thoroughness.
- Ability to work under pressure and meet tight deadlines.
- Proactive and curious, with a strong desire to continuously learn and improve.
Work Environment:
- The Research Analyst will primarily work in an office environment but may occasionally be required to attend conferences, industry events, or client meetings.
- The role may require extended hours during peak periods or in response to market events.
Job Types: Full-time, Permanent
Benefits:

Job detailsHere’s how the job details align with your profile.Pay₹45,000 - ₹55,000 a monthJob typeFull-timeShift and scheduleWeekend availabilityDay shift LocationBasavanagudi, Bengaluru, Karnataka BenefitsPulled from the full job descriptionHealth insuranceProvident Fund Full job descriptionWe are seeking a dynamic and creative Marketing Manager to lead and execute marketing strategies for our salon business. The Marketing Manager will be responsible for developing and implementing marketing campaigns, driving brand awareness, and increasing customer engagement to promote our salon services and products.
Key Responsibilities:
1. Strategic Planning: Develop, implement, and manage comprehensive marketing strategies and campaigns to promote the salon's services and products.
2. Brand Management: Maintain and enhance the salon's brand image and ensure consistent messaging across all marketing materials and channels.
3. Digital Marketing: Oversee online presence, including website, social media, email marketing, and online advertising. Create and manage digital marketing campaigns to attract and retain customers.
4. Traditional Marketing: Manage offline marketing efforts, such as print materials, direct mail, local events, and partnerships to drive salon traffic.
5. Market Research: Analyze market trends, customer preferences, and competition to identify opportunities for growth. Conduct market research and customer surveys to gather insights.
6. Budget Management: Develop and manage the marketing budget, ensuring that expenses are within budget while delivering effective results.
7. Advertising and Promotions: Plan and execute advertising and promotional campaigns to increase customer acquisition and retention.
8. Content Creation: Create high-quality, engaging content for various marketing channels, including blog posts, social media, email newsletters, and video content.
9. Analytics and Reporting: Monitor and analyze the performance of marketing initiatives, using data and analytics tools to make data-driven decisions and adjustments.
10. Team Management: Lead and mentor a team of marketing professionals to ensure successful campaign execution.
Qualifications:
· Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field. Master's degree is a plus.
· Proven experience as a Marketing Manager in the salon, beauty, or related industry.
· Strong understanding of the salon industry, customer preferences, and market trends.
· Proficiency in digital marketing tools and platforms, including SEO, SEM, social media, and email marketing.
· Excellent communication, writing, and creative skills.
· Analytical mindset with the ability to interpret data and make informed decisions.
· Strong leadership and team management skills.
· Ability to work collaboratively with salon management and staff.
· Exceptional organizational and project management abilities.
· Results-oriented, with a demonstrated track record of achieving marketing objectives.
Additional Information:
This position may require occasional travel and evening/weekend work, as needed for marketing events or promotions.
The Marketing Manager will report to the [Marketing Director/General Manager/Owner] and collaborate with other departments.

Job Description:
Job detailsHere’s how the job details align with your profile.Pay₹15,000 - ₹40,000 a monthJob typeFull-timePermanentShift and scheduleDay shiftMonday to Friday LocationChennai, Tamil Nadu BenefitsPulled from the full job descriptionFlexible scheduleHealth insuranceLife insuranceProvident Fund Full job descriptionJob Title: Field Sales Executive
Location: Chennai
Company: Booktara
Position Type: Full-Time (contract)
Compensation: payout based on performance (no. of onboardings)
About Booktara:
Booktara is a revolutionary booking platform designed to help businesses enhance their online presence and streamline their booking process. As a Reserve with Google Partner, Booktara integrates with Google to help businesses gain visibility and attract more customers. We cater to a diverse range of industries, including salons, beauty parlors, health clinics, car & bike washes, pet clinics, and more. Our platform offers a comprehensive solution for businesses to manage their bookings, showcase their services, and grow their customer base efficiently.
Role Overview:
We are seeking a motivated and experienced Field Sales Executive to join our dynamic team.
The ideal candidate will have a strong background in field sales, particularly with platforms like Paytm, PhonePe, or Google Pay, and will be responsible for reaching out to business owners, explaining the benefits of Booktara, and driving successful onboardings. This role involves door-to-door visits, engaging with potential clients, and guiding them through the onboarding process.
Key Responsibilities:
● Business Outreach: Conduct door-to-door visits to local businesses across various industries, including salons, beauty parlors, health clinics, car & bike washes, pet clinics, etc., to introduce Booktara and its benefits.
● Sales Pitch: Effectively communicate how Booktara can help businesses grow by
leveraging its integration with Google to increase orders and improve visibility.
● Onboarding Process: Assist business owners with the onboarding procedure, which includes:
○ Collecting business details and service offerings (menu) with pricing.
○ Taking photos of the business’s physical store.
○ Guiding the business owner in copying and pasting their customized Booktara
website link into their Google My Business account.
● Customer Relationship Management: Build and maintain strong relationships with
business owners to ensure a smooth onboarding experience and address any concerns or questions they may have.
Requirements:
● Experience: Proven experience in field sales, preferably with a background in selling
digital or booking solutions such as Paytm, PhonePe, or Google Pay.
● Skills: Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to effectively
pitch and sell the Booktara platform to a diverse range of businesses.
● Self-Motivated: Ability to work independently, manage time efficiently, and achieve sales
targets with minimal supervision.
● Tech-Savvy: Basic understanding of online booking systems, Google My Business, and
digital marketing concepts.
● Documentation: Strong attention to detail and ability to accurately collect and record
business information and photos.
● Location: Must be willing to travel within the assigned territory and conduct in-person
visits to potential clients.
● Transportation: 2-wheeler with license is mandatory.
Benefits:
● Performance-Based Pay: Earn ₹150 - ₹200 (negotiable) for each successful
onboarding, with potential for high earnings based on performance. Monthly earnings can be upto Rs. 2,00,000
● Flexible Schedule: Manage your own schedule to optimize field visits and sales
opportunities.
● Supportive Team: Receive training and support from a dedicated team to help you
succeed in your role.
How to Apply:
Interested candidates are invited to send their resume outlining their relevant experience to richy@booktara.com with the subject line “Field Sales Executive Application – [Your Name].”
Join Booktara and be part of a team that's transforming the way businesses manage their bookings and grow their customer base
